GK16andhvc2u:5: avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaner vācyaṃ dvidhā matam // DhvK_2.1 //
GK16andhvc2u:8: locanam dvitīya uddyotaḥ yā smaryamāṇā śreyāṃsi sūte dhvaṃsayate rujaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:17: tatra dviprakāraprakāśane vṛttikārakṛte yannimittaṃ bījabhūtamiti bālapriyā dvitīya uddyotaḥ locanasyottarasyāto na vyākhyā prapyate 'tra tat
GK16andhvc2u:26: yadvā-abhīṣṭāni phalāni yasyāṃ sā udārā mahatī ca kalpavallī tāmiti rūpakam /
GK16andhvc2u:55: tatra prathamoddyote vṛttikāreṇa prakāśitaḥ avivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo 'vāntaraprakārastatpratipādanāyedamucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:56: tadavāntarabhedapratipādanadvāreṇaiva cānuvādadvāreṇāvivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo vivakṣitānyaparavācyātprabhinnatvaṃ tatpratipādanāyedamucyate
GK16andhvc2u:59: saṅkramitamiti ṇicā vyañcanāvyāpāre yaḥ sahakārivargastasyāyaṃ prabhāva ityuktaṃ tiraskṛtaśabdena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:60: yena vācyenāvivakṣitena satāvivakṣitāvācyo dhvanirvyapadiśyate tadvācyaṃ dvidheti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:61: yo 'rthaṃ upapadyamano 'pi tāvataivānupayogāddharmāntarasaṃvalanayānyatāmiva gato lakṣyamāṇo 'nugatadharmī sūtranyāyenāste sa rūpāntarapariṇata uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:62: bālapriyā “iti pratamodyota” ityuktatvādatra pakṣe tatreti tatpadena tasya parāmarśa ityāhṛ--
GK16andhvc2u:66: atra pakṣe ata iti śeṣo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:108: dharmāntarasaṃvalanayā vācyadharmātiriktadharmaprakārakapratītiviṣayatvena hetunā anyatāṃ gata iva lakṣyamāṇaḥ pratīyamānaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:109: anugatadharmī san lakṣyamāṇadharmāṇāṃ tatra tatra bhinnatve 'pi vyaktirūpo dharmī anustūta eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:114: snigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladbalākā dhanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:115: locanam yastvanupapadyamāna upāyatāmātreṇārthāntarapratipattiṃ kṛtāv palāyata iva sa tiraskṛta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:116: nanu vyaṅgyātmano yadā dhvanerbhedo nirūpyate tadā vācyasāya dvidheti bhedakathanaṃ na saṅgatamityāśaṅkyāha--
GK16andhvc2u:120: vyañjake tvarthe yadi dhvaniśabdastadā na kaściddoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:124: snigdhayā jalasambandhasarasayā śyāmalayā draviḍavanitocitāsitavarṇayā kāntyā cākacakyena
GK16andhvc2u:125: liptamācchuritaṃ viyannabho yaiḥ vellantyo vijṛmbhamāṇāstatā calantyaḥ parabhāgavaśātpraharṣavaśācca
GK16andhvc2u:126: balākāḥ bālapriyā rūpāntarapariṇata iti arthāntare saṅkramitamityasyaiva vivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:142: viśeṣa ityasyānantaraṃ 'iti vyaṅgyaprakāśanaparasya dhvanerevāyaṃ prakāraḥ' iti pāṭhaḥ kvācitkaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:147: tatrādyapakṣe avivakṣitavācyasyetyasya avivakṣitaḥ apradhānīkṛto vācyassvātmā yena sa iti prathamodyotoktārthau bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:166: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarve sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava //
GK16andhvc2u:167: locanam sitapakṣiviśeṣā yeṣu ta evaṃ nabhastāvaddurālokaṃ vartate /
GK16andhvc2u:169: yataḥ sūkṣmajalakaṇodgāriṇo vātā iti mandamandatvameṣāmaniyatadigāgamanaṃ ca bahuvacanena sūcitam /
GK16andhvc2u:171: payodānāṃ ye suhṛdasteṣu ca satsu ye śobhanahṛdayā mayūrāsteṣāmānandena harṣeṇa kalāḥ ṣaṅjasaṃvādinyo madhurāḥ kekāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ tāśca sarvaṃ payodavṛttāntaṃ dussahaṃ smārayanti;
GK16andhvc2u:173: evamuddīpanavibhāvodbodhitavipralambhaḥ parasparādhiṣṭānatvadrateḥ vibhāvānāṃ sādhāraṇatāmabhimanyamānaḥ ita eva prabhṛti priyatamāṃ hṛdayenidhāyaiva svātmavṛttāntaṃ tāvadāha--
GK16andhvc2u:181: sa bālapriyā śīkarima iti śīkarasambandhapratipādanena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:189: śobhanahṛdayā iti ata evānanda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:217: tathāca kaṭhorahṛdayapadantadarthānuguṇānāmeva dharmāṇāṃ rāmaśabdena vyañjene sahaṅkāritayā nirdiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:226: uktaprakāreṇa hṛdayanihitāṃ priyāṃ smaraṇaśabdavikalpaparamparayā pratyakṣībhāvitāṃ hṛdayasphoṭanonmukhīṃ sasaṃbhramamāha--
GK16andhvc2u:236: pratīyamānaṃ tu tadasaṅkhyamanudbhi viseṣatvenaiva kiṃ kiṃ rūpaṃ na sahata iti citrapānakarasāpūpaguḍamodakasthānīyavicitracarvaṇāpadaṃ bhavati
GK16andhvc2u:275: anudbhinnaḥ aspaṣṭaḥviśeṣaḥ pārthakyaṃ parasparabheda iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:278: kintu parasparasaṃvalitatvenaiva prayojanapratītau tathā rājyanirvāsanādayo dharmā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:285: guḍopaskṛtaṃ modakaṃ guḍamodakaṃ tatsthānīyā taccarvaṇākatulyā yā vicitrā vilakṣaṇā carvaṇā rāmagatatvena tattaddharmāvagāhinī pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:286: tasyāḥ padaṃ viṣaya yathā ca mamaiva viṣamabāṇalīlāyām---
GK16andhvc2u:287: tālā jāanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppānti /
GK16andhvc2u:293: locanam eṣa eva sarvatra prayojanasya pratīyamānatvenotkarṣaheturmantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:294: mātragrahaṇena saṃjñī nātra tiraskṛta ityāha---yathā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:301: tena śuddhe 'rthe mukhye bādhānimittaṃ tatrārthe taddharmasamavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:302: tena nimittena rāmaśabdo dharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:314: atra rāmapadalakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ rāmapadavācyatvaṃ sāmānyato duḥkhapātratvaṃ vā bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:317: tadā guṇāḥ atiśayādhāyako dharmo gumastadvantaḥ santaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:330: lakṣmīpātratvādi yaddharmāntaraśataṃ tasya citratā citratāviśiṣṭaṃ taditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:354: anupayogabādhito hyartho 'sya dhvanerviṣayo lakṣaṇā mūlaṃ hyasya /
GK16andhvc2u:355: yattu hṛdayadarpaṇa uktam---'hahā heti saṃrambhārtho 'yaṃ camatkāraḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:358: ahaṃ sahe tasyāḥ ki vartata ityevamātmā hi saṃrambhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:359: kamalapade ca kaḥ saṃrambha ityāstāṃ tāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:369: dvītīyo guṇaśabdaḥ utkṛṣṭatvādidharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ lakṣyatītyādyāśaṅkāṃ parihartumāha---guṇaśabda ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:388: na tu lakṣaṇāyā viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:393: hahāhetyanena gabhyo yassaṃrambhaḥ tasyārthaḥ kāryabhūta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:404: ahaṃ sarvaṃ sahe ityarthasyopodbalako hi rāmaśabdābhivyaktārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:406: mukhyārthasya padārthāntarānvayānupapattijñānamiva prakṛtānuṣayuktatvajñānamapi lakṣaṇābījamato 'nupayuktatvajñānarūpo 'pi mukhyārthabādhāpadārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:423: andho 'yaṃ puro 'pi na paśyatītyatra tiraskārondhārthasya na tvatyantam /
GK16andhvc2u:425: andhaśabdo 'tra padārthasphuṭīkaraṇāśaktatvaṃ naṣṭadṛṣṭigataṃ nimattīkṛtyādarśaṃ lakṣaṇayā pratipādayati /
GK16andhvc2u:440: prakṛtodāraṇe andhapadavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtatvaṃ viśadayitumanyatra tadabhāvaṃ darśayati---andha ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:461: niśvāsāndha iva ya ādarśastadrūpaścandramā iti yojanaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:464: ivaśabdasyobhayatra sambandho 'stviti śaṅkāṃ pariharan āha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:468: gaaṇaṃ ca mattamehaṃ dhārāluliajjuṇāiṃ a vaṇāiṃ /
GK16andhvc2u:470: locanam na ca niḥśvāsenāndha ivādarśaḥ sa iva candra iti kalpanā yuktā /
GK16andhvc2u:473: gaganaṃ ca mattameghaṃ dhārālulitārjunāni ca vanāni /
GK16andhvc2u:479: nirahaṅkāramṛgāṅkā nīlā apiniśā na kevalaṃ sitakarakaradhavalitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:484: na hi svarūpādeva bhedo bhavatītyāṅkya vivaṅkṣitavācyādevāsya bhedo bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:486: bālapriyā gaganaṃ ceti varṣāvarṇanam. ca śabda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:499: pratiṣedhasya prasaktipūrvakatvānnarahaṅkāraśabdo hyahaṅkārasvarūpayogye cetanaviśeṣe eva svarasataḥ prayujyata ityato 'tra mukhyārthasyānvayānupapattirūpabādhā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:522: vivakṣitābhidheyasya dhvaner ātmā dvidhā mataḥ // DhvK_2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:528: locanam samyaṅ na lakṣayituṃ śakyaḥ kramo yasya tādṛśa uddyota uddyotanavyāpāro 'syeti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:535: idānīṃ tu dyotanavyāpāramukhena dyotyasya khātmaniṣṭa evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:536: vyaṅgyasya dhvanerdyetane svātnani kaḥ krama ityāśaṅkyāha----vācyārthāpekṣayeti /
GK16andhvc2u:540: yo rasādirarthaḥ sa evākramo dhvanerātmā na tvakrama eva saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:546: nanu kiṃ sarvadaiva rasādirartho dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:548: etacca sāmānyalakṣaṇe 'guṇīkṛtasvārthāvi'tyatra bālapriyā kuto noktamityata āha---dhvaniśabdetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:562: rasetyādikārikāyāmaṅgibhāvena bhāsamāno rasabhāvādiḥ akramo ghnanerātmā vyavasthita ityanvayo vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:575: aṅgibhāvena bhāsamāna ityasya vivaraṇam--aṅgitvenetyādi etadukteḥ paunaruktyamāśaṅkate--rataccetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:585: yadyapi ca rasenaiva sarvaṃ jīvati kāvyam tathāpi tasya rasasyaikadhanacamatkārātmano 'pi kutaścidaṃśātprayojakībhūtādadhiko 'sau camatkāro bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:586: tatra yadā kaścidudriktāvasthāṃ pratipanno vyabhicārī camatkārātiśayaprayojako bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:588: yathā---- tiṣṭetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:589: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovavartinīṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayoryāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:594: yathā-- yote gotraviparyaye śrutipathaṃ śayyāmanuprāptayā nirdhyātaṃ parivartanaṃ punarapi prārabdhumaṅgīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:597: aṅgibhāvena bhāsamāna ityuktāvaṅgabhāvena bhāne kaḥ prakāra iti jijñāsāyāḥ sambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:628: locanam bhūyastatprakṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ca śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā tanvaṅgyā na tu pāritaḥ stanabharaḥ kraṣṭuṃ priyasyorasaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:629: atra hi praṇayakopasyojjigamiṣayaiva yadavasthānaṃ na tu pārita ityudayāvakāśanirākaraṇāttadevāsvādajīvitam /
GK16andhvc2u:634: atra cerṣyāvipralambhasya rasasyāpi praśama iti śakyaṃ yojayitum /
GK16andhvc2u:636: yathā--- osuru sumṭhi āhaṃ muhu cumbau jeṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:638: ityatra śrutyukte tu kope kopakaṣāyagadgadamandaruditāyā yena mukhaṃ cumbitaṃ tenāmṛtarasanigaraṇaviśrāntiparamparāṇāṃ tṛptirjñāteti kopaprasādasandhiścamatkārasthānam
GK16andhvc2u:646: śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā pūrvaṃ śithilā śitilīkṛtā paścādanyatra kṣiptā ca ekadorlekhā yayā tathā satyā /
GK16andhvc2u:649: jānātīcchati yatate ceṣṭate iti kramo 'tra pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:652: 'stanabharaḥ priyasya urasaḥ kraṣṭuṃ na pārita' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:668: yadvā---amṛtarasasya viśrāntipūrvakāṇi nigaraṇāni viśramya viśramya nigaraṇāni /
GK16andhvc2u:673: yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc2u:674: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kutadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ sāvasthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati //
GK16andhvc2u:675: atra hi vitakāraitsukye matismaraṇe śahkādainye dhṛticintane parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvena dvandvaśo bhavantī,
GK16andhvc2u:676: paryante tu cintāyā eva pradhānatāṃ dadatī paramāsvādasthānam /
GK16andhvc2u:679: nanvevaṃ vibhāvānubhāvamukhenāpyadhikaścamatkāro dṛśyata iti vibhāvadvaniranubhāvadhvaniśca vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:681: taccarvaṇāpi cittavṛttiṣveva paryavasyatīti rasabhāvebhyo nādhikaṃ carvāṇīyam /
GK16andhvc2u:682: yadā tu vibhāvānubhāvāvapi vyaṅyau bhavatastadā vastudhvanirapi kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc2u:769: yadyapi 'śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsyaḥ' iti muninā nirūpitaṃ tathāpyauttarakālikaṃ tatra hāsyarasatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:770: dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śrutiṃ cetaḥ kālakalāmapi prakurute nāvasthitiṃ tāṃ vinā /
GK16andhvc2u:775: aścābhāsatā yenāsya sītā mayyupekṣikā dviṣṭā veti pratipattirhṛdayaṃ na spṛśatyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:778: ata eva tadābhāsatvaṃ vastutastatra sthāpyate śuktau rajatābhāsavat /
GK16andhvc2u:780: tathā ca tatra hāsyo raso vaktuṃ nyāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:783: taccarvaṇottaramayamananuraktāṃ kāmayata iti rāvaṇāmilāṣādyālamvitasya hāsasya sahṛdayānāmudbodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:785: 'etairākulitasya vikṣatarateraṅgairanaṅgāturaiḥ sampadyeta kathaṃ tadāptisukhaṃmityetanna vejhi sphuṭam' ityuttarārdham /
GK16andhvc2u:787: dūrākarṣaṇaṃ mohaśca tatkārī yo mantraḥ tasminnavetyupamā /
GK16andhvc2u:791: ākulitasya vihvalīkṛtasya vikṣatā naṣṭā ratiḥ viṣayāntareṣu ruciryasya tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:828: śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsya iti prayuñjāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:831: ata evābhilāṣe ekataraniṣṭe 'pi śṛṅgaraśabdena tatra tatra vyavahārastadābhāsatayā mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:833: evaṃ rasadhvanerevāmī bhāvadhvaniprabhṛtayo niṣyandā āsvāde pradhānaṃprayojakamevamaṃśaṃ vibhajya pṛthagvyavasthapyate /
GK16andhvc2u:835: rasadhvanistu sa eva yo 'tra mukhyatayā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyojanoditasthāyi pratipattikasya pratipattuḥ sthāyyaṃśacarvaṇāprayukta evāsvādaprakarṣaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:836: yathā--- kṛcchreṇoruyugaṃ vyatītya suciraṃ bhrāntvā nitambasthale madhye 'syāstrivalītaraṅgaviṣame niḥṣpandatāmāgatā /
GK16andhvc2u:837: maddṛṣṭistṛṣiteva samprati śanerāruhya tuṅgo stanau sākāṅkṣaṃ muhurīkṣate jalalavaprasyandinī locane //
GK16andhvc2u:838: atra hi nāyikākārānuvarṇyamānasvātmapratikṛtipavitritacitraphalakāvalokanādvatsarājasya bālapriyā iti hyoko 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:845: kathaṃ tarhi pṛthagvyavahāra ityata āha---āsvāda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:852: ekāsvādaḥ yaḥ sammūrcchitasya vyāptasya āmodasya upabhogaḥ tasminnapi /
GK16andhvc2u:856: vibhāvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanena taccarvaṇāyā uditā utpannā sthāyipratipattiḥ yasya /
GK16andhvc2u:860: trivalyeva taraṅgaḥ taraṅgatulyā trivalī vā tena viṣame nimnonnate /
GK16andhvc2u:865: atroruyugasya nitambasya cātiviśālatvaṃ madhyasya tanutvaṃ stanayormahatvaṃ ca gamyata iti saundaryātiśayo jalalavetyādinā nāyikāyā virahaduḥkhātiśayasca vyajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:868: nāyikākāreṇa likhitanāyikāpratikṛtyā hetunā anuvarṇyamānaṃ narmasacivaṃ pratimaharvarṇyabhānaṃ svātmapratikṛtyā likhitanāyakapratikṛtyā pavitritaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:871: idānīṃ rasavadalaṅkārādalakṣyakramadyotanātmano dhvanervibhakto viṣaya iti pradarśyate---
GK16andhvc2u:873: rasādi-paratā yatra sa dhvaner viṣayo mataḥ // DhvK_2.4 //
GK16andhvc2u:876: locanam parasparāsthābandharūpo ratisthāyibhāvo vibhāvānubhāvasaṃyojanavaśena carvaṇārūḍha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:886: anayā ca bhaṅgyā rasavadādiṣvalaṅkāreṣu rasādidhvanernāntarbhāva iti sūcayati /
GK16andhvc2u:887: pūrvaṃ hi samāsoktyādiṣu vastudhvanernāntarbhāva iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:888: vācyaṃ ca vācakaṃ ca taccārutvahetavaśceti dvandvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:892: nanūktaṃ bhaṭṭanāyakena---“raso yadā paragatatayā pratīyate tarhi tāṭasthyameva syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:893: na ca bālapriyā kartrā anuvarṇyamānā dṛśyamānā,
GK16andhvc2u:899: vācyetyādikārikāyāṃ 'śabdālaṅkārā' ityādivṛttau cārthāntarabhramaḥ syādityato vivakṣitamarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe---vācyatrcetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:910: tāṭasthye sati svarasanīyatvaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:912: 'asau svagatatvena na ca pratīyata' iti sambandhaḥ tatpratyāyakābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:918: kāntātvaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ vāsanāvikāsahetuvibhāvatāyāṃ prayojakamiti cet---devatāvarmanādau tadapi katham /
GK16andhvc2u:920: alokasāmānyānāṃ ca rāmādīnāṃ ye samudrasetubandhādayo vibhāvāṃste kathaṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ bhajeyuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:929: nanu rasa utpadyatāmityatrāha-sā cetyādi. sā ca svātmani rasotpatiśca /
GK16andhvc2u:937: vāsanāyāḥ sahṛdayagataratyādivāsanāyāḥ yo vikākaudbodhaḥ tasya heturyo vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:941: tathā ca sītāyāḥ mānuṣītvena sītādau sahṛdayānāṃ kāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:945: devatāsvamātrādernāyikātvena varṇanasthale devatādāvāradhyatvajñānena pratibandhāttatra kāmyatvarūpakāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:946: nanu kāvyāditaḥ sītādijñāne jāte sahṛdayānāṃ svakāntāsmaraṇaṃ jāyate,
GK16andhvc2u:947: tena ca tadvāsanodvodha ityata āha---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:954: samudrasetubandhanānau utsāhahetuḥ svakṛtisādhyatvabuddhirhṛdayasaṃvādo vā sahṛdayānāṃ notpadyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:962: utpattipakṣe ca karuṇasyotpādādduḥkhitve karuṇaprekṣāsu punarapravṛttiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:965: śaktirūpasya hi śṛṅgārasyabhivyaktau viṣayārjanatāratamyapravṛttiḥ syāt tatrāpi kiṃ khagato 'bhivyajyate rasaḥ paragato veti pūrvavadeva doṣaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:966: tena na pratīyate notpadyate nābhivyajyate kāvyena rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:971: tatrābhidhābhāgo yadi śuddhaḥ syāttattantrādibhyaḥ śāstranyāyebhyaḥ śleṣādyalaṅkāraṇāṃ ko bhedaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:983: nanu ratyādirūpo rasaḥ sūkṣmarūpema sahṛdayānāmātmani vartata ityataḥ siddha evetyatrāha---śaktītyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:989: viṣayo ratyādiviṣayaḥ kāntādiḥ abhivyaktyupāya iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:990: tasya arjane sampādane tāratamyapravṛttiḥ taratamabhāvena pravṛttiḥ syāditi /
GK16andhvc2u:992: janānāṃ pravṛttistathā vāsanātmatayā antaḥ sthitasya ratyāderadhikādhikābhivyaktaye
GK16andhvc2u:1018: śāstrai locanam tena rasabhāvanākhyo divatīyo vyāpāraḥ;
GK16andhvc2u:1020: taccaitadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma rasān prati yatkāvyasya tadvibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇatvāpādanaṃ nāma /
GK16andhvc2u:1021: bhāvite ca rase tasya bhogaḥ yo 'nubhavasmaraṇapratipattibhyo vilakṣaṇa eva drutivistaravikāsātmā
GK16andhvc2u:1023: sa eva ca pradhānabhūtoṃ'śaḥ siddharūpa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1025: bālapriyā “halantyami“ti paṇinīyasūtrādāviva “sarvado mādhava” ityādiśleṣasthale 'pi tantrādinānekārthabodhasambhavādubhayorbhedo na syādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1027: vṛttibhedāḥ upanāgarikādyāḥ teṣāṃ vaicitryaṃ ca akiñcitkaramiti /
GK16andhvc2u:1041: rasān prati etadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma taditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1055: tathāca bhāvanopanīto rāmādigataratyādiḥ sthāyī sahṛdayairbhujyamāno rasaḥ ratyādeḥ sādhāraṇyena pratītyā ca na tāṭasthyādidoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1058: anubhavasmaraṇarūpāḥ yāḥ pratīpattayo laukikyaḥ pratītayastābhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1064: nijacitsvabhāvā svātmacaitanyarūpā ca yā nivṛtiḥ lokottarānandaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1065: tasyāṃ viśrāntiḥ vigalitavedyāntaratayā sthitiḥ tallakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1066: atra rajaso guṇasyānuvedhena drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsa iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1067: uktaṃ hi kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---“yadāhi rajaso guṇasya drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsaḥ tadā bhogaḥ svarūpaṃ lamata” iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1074: pratipattṝṇāṃ locanam atrocyate---rasasvarūpa eva tāvadvipratipattayaḥ prativādinām /
GK16andhvc2u:1075: tathāhi-pūrvāvasthāyāṃ yaḥ sthāyī sa eva vyabhicārisampātādinā prāptaparipoṣo 'nukāryagata eva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1077: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ cittavṛttau cittavṛtteḥ cittavṛttyantareṇa kaḥ paripoṣārthaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1078: vismayaśokakrodhādeśca krameṇa tāvanna paripoṣa iti nānukārye rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1101: nāṭyasya nāṭyasambandhī vā raso nāṭyarasa iti vyutpattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1102: matamidaṃ dūṣayitvā prakārāntareṇa vadatāṃ śrīśaṅkukādīnāṃ mataṃ darśayati----pravāhetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1104: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ tattatkāraṇavaśena punaḥ punarutpadyamānāyāṃ naśyantyāṃ ca satyāmiti hetugarbham /
GK16andhvc2u:1113: yathoktaṃ kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---“iṣṭaviyogajo mahān śokaḥ kramema śāmyati,
GK16andhvc2u:1114: na tu dṛḍhībhavati krodhotsāharatayaśca nijanijakāraṇodbhūtā api kālavasādamarṣasthairyasavāviparyaye 'pacīyanta” iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1117: anukāryarāmādigato rasa ityuktapakṣo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1122: layo nāma nṛttagītavādyānāmekatānatārūpaṃ sāmyaṃ rasasya naṭe siddhatvena tadupayogilayādyanusaraṇaṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1130: rāmaḥ sukhīti smṛtivilakṣaṇā sthāyini pratītigocaratayāsvādarūpā pratipattiranu kartrālambanā
GK16andhvc2u:1133: kiṃ tvanukāryābhinnābhimate nartake āsvādayitā sāmājika ityetāvanmātramadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1134: tena nāṭya eva bālapriyā tadbhāve ityanuṣajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1136: rāmāderiva sāmājikasyāpi ratyādirūparasotpattau camatkāro na jāyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1154: sthāyino rāmādivyaktiviśeṣavṛttitvavaiśiṣṭyamavabudhya naṭena tadanukāre kriyamāṇe tathaiva sāmājikānāṃ pratītyā tasya taṭasthatvena caturvargopāyavyutpatteranudayādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1155: anena sthāyyanukāro rasa iti pakṣo 'pyayukta iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:1183: tathāvidhapratītirūparasasya nartakaviśeṣyakatvānnartake viśeṣyatāsambandhena satvātsa evāśraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1188: anye tu---anukartari yaḥ sthāyyavabhāso 'bhinayādisāmagpyādikṛto bhittāvivaharitālādinā aśvāvabhāsaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1189: sa eva lokātītatayāsvādāparasaṃjñayā pratītyā rasyamāno rasa iti nāṭyādrasā nāṭyarasāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1190: apare punarvibhāvānubhāvamātrameva viśiṣṭasāmagapyā samarpyamāṇaṃ tadvibhāvanīyānubhāvanīyasthāyirūpacittavṛttyucitavāsanānuṣaktaṃ svanirvṛticarvaṇāviśiṣṭameva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1202: evaṃ sthite prathamapakṣa bālapriyā nāṭye iti chedaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1204: rāmādigatasthāyino 'nukāre naṭe sthāyyavabhāso mithyājñānarūpaḥ sāmājikānāṃ jāyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1205: sa eva camatkārakārī rasa iti kecittanmatamāha----anya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1221: tābhyāṃ vibhavānubhavābhyāṃ kramādvibhāvaniyā anubhāvanīyā ca yā ratyādisthāyirūpacittavṛtyucitā vāsanā sāmājikagatā tadanuṣaktaṃ tatsambaddham
GK16andhvc2u:1223: svasya sāmājikasya nirvṛtirūpā yā carvaṇā tadviśiṣṭaṃ tadviṣayabhūtam /
GK16andhvc2u:1226: 'śuddhaṃ vibhāvam' ityādau sarvatra rasamāhurityasya sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1228: “svabhāvābhinayopetaṃ na nāstrīpuruṣāśrayaṃ nāṭyaṃ lokadharmi” “svarālaṅkārasaṃyuktamasvasthapuruṣāśrayaṃ nāṭyaṃ nāṭyadharmi” tatsthānīyena tattulyena /
GK16andhvc2u:1234: alaukiko laukikaśabdavyatiriktaḥ prasanno madhura ojasvī ca yaḥ śabdaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1249: kiṃ tu yathā pratītimātratvenāviśiṣṭatve 'pi prātyakṣikī ānumānikī āgamotthā pratibhānakṛtā yogipratyakṣajā ca pratītirupāyavailakṣṇyādanyaiva,
GK16andhvc2u:1252: rasāḥ pratīyanta iti odanaṃ pacatītivadyvavahāraḥ pratīyamāna eva hi rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1259: rāmādicaritaṃ tu na sarvasya hṛdayasaṃvādīti mahatsāhasam /
GK16andhvc2u:1272: piśāco hi viśiṣyājñātatvenātrāyaṃ viśāca ityādi lokavyavahārānarhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1286: pakvastaṇḍulo hyodanapadārtha iti tadvayavahāro yathā aupacārikaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1320: kāvyaṃ ca rasān prati bhāvakamiti yaducyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1324: tathāca lokottaracariteṣvapi sahṛdayānāṃ hṛdayasaṃvādo bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1329: bhojarājena sūtradvayamidamitthaṃ vivṛtam--iha nānāyoniṣu bhramatāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ kāñcidyonimanubhūya yadā yonyantarasahasravyavadhānena punastāmeva yoniṃ pratipadyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1330: tadā tasyāṃ pūrvānubhūtāyāṃ yonau tathāvidhaśarīrādivyañjakāpekṣayā yā vāsanāḥ prakaṭībhūtā
GK16andhvc2u:1332: jātideśakālavyavadhāne 'pi tāsāṃ svanurūpasmṛtyādiphalasādhane ānantaryaṃ nairantaryaṃ kutaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1342: tadā kiṃ vāsanānimitta uta nirnimitta iti śaṅkāṃ vyapanetumāha--'tāsāṃ'vāsanānāṃ 'anāditva' masti, kutaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1343: 'āśiṣo nityatvāt' seyamāśīrmahāmoharūpā sadaiva sukhasādhanāni me bhūyāsurmā kadācana tairme viyogo 'bhūditi yaḥ saṅkalpaviśeṣo vāsanānāṃ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ nityatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1344: etaduktaṃ bhavati---kāraṇasya sannihitatvādanubavasaṃskārādīnāṃ kāryaṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ kena vāryata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1363: kiñca bhāvakatvasvīkāre raso notpadyata iti bhavadīyapratijñāyā bhaṅge 'pyāpatati ityāha---kāvyaṃ cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1367: locanam tatra bhavataiva bhāvanādutpattipakṣa eva pratyujjīvitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1373: tasmādvayañjakatvākhyena vyāpārema guṇālaṅkāraucityādikayetikartavyatayā kāvyaṃ bhāvakaṃ rasān bhāvayati,
GK16andhvc2u:1374: iti tryaṃsāyāmapi bhāvanāyāṃ karaṇāṃśe dhvananavyāpāra eva mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1375: tacacedaṃ bhogakṛttvaṃ rasasya dhvananītyatve siddhe daivasiddham /
GK16andhvc2u:1393: itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ prayājādikriyākalāpaśca itikartavyatātvena tasyāṃ bhāvanāyamanvetīti mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1394: tathā ca yajetetyādivaidikavākyaṃ svargamudṛsya puruṣaṃ prati vidhāyakatvena yathā bhāvakaṃ yāgena karaṇena prayājādītikartavyatayā svargārthinaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1395: tathā kāvyaṃ bhāvakaṃ vyañjakatvavyāpāreṇa karaṇena guṇālaṅkāraucityādirūpayā itikartavyatayā sagṛdayasya rasaṃ bhāvayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1409: kriyata evetyarthaḥ. nana kriyata iti vā pāṭhaṃ(?)
GK16andhvc2u:1411: 'api tu bhoge kartavye lokottaro dhvananavyāpāra eva mūrdhābhiṣikta' iti samābandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1413: dhanaṃ nibiḍaṃ yanmeharūpamāndhyamajñānaṃ tena yā saṅkaṭatā ānandāṃśasyāvṛtatvaṃ tasyā nivṛtitirbhañjanaṃ taddvāreṇetyathaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1418: rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamalakṣaṇaṃ mukhyamarthamanuvartamānā yatra śabdārthālaṅkārā guṇāśca parasparaṃ dhvanyapekṣayā vibhinnarūpā vyavasthitāstatra kāvye dhvaniriti vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1423: yathā rāmastathāhamityupamānātiriktāṃ rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvijṛmbhārūpāṃ vyutpattimante karotīti kamupālabhāmahe /
GK16andhvc2u:1424: tasmātsthitametat---abhiviyajyante rasāḥ pratītyaiva ca rasyanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1435: rasyamānatayā hetunā udito yaścamatkāraḥ camatkāratmakaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ tadanatiriktatvāttabhinnatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1454: iti yadupamānamityākārikā yā upamitiḥ sādṛśyadhīḥ śāstretihāsābhyāṃ kriyamāṇā tadatiriktāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1458: rasāsvādopāyabhūtā svasya pratipattuḥ yā pratibhā tasyā vijṛmbho vikāsastadrūpāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1461: punaḥ punaḥ kāvyapariśīlane hi rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvikāso bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1462: ante karotītyanenādāvuktopamitirūpāṃ vyutpattiṃ ci karotīti jñāpyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1474: kāvye tasminn alaṅkāro rasādir iti me matiḥ // DhvK_2.5 //
GK16andhvc2u:1477: yadyapi rasavadalaṅkārasyānyairdarśito viṣayastathāpi yasmin kāveya pradhānatayānyo
GK16andhvc2u:1478: 'rtho vākyārthībhūtastasya cāṅgabhūtā ye rasādayaste rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣayā iti māmakīnaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1479: tadyathā cāṭuṣu preyolaṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc2u:1482: me matirityanyapakṣaṃ dūpyatvena hṛdi nidhāyābhīṣṭatatvātsvapakṣaṃ pūrvaṃ darśayati--tathāpiti /
GK16andhvc2u:1483: sa hi paradarśito viṣayo bhāvinītyānopapanna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1484: yasmin kāvye iti spaṣṭatvenāsaṅgataṃ vākyamitthaṃ yojanīyam--yasmin kāvye te pūrvoktā rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā vākyārthībhūtaścānyo 'rthaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1486: tasya kāvyasya sambandhino ye rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtāste rasāderalaṅkārasya rasavadādyalaṅkāraśabdasya viṣayāḥ;
GK16andhvc2u:1493: bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa cāṭuṣu preyolaṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyanta itīdamekaṃ vākyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1508: tasya cāṅgabhūtā ityatra tatpadena kāvyasyaiva parāmṛśyatayā yathāśrute tadarthasya tannirūpitāṅgatvasya rasādāvasambhavenāsaṅgatārthakamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1510: te rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā ityasya pūrvavākye 'pi sambandha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1518: tathāca tasyeti ṣaṣṭhyantārthasya kāvyasambandhitvasya rasādāvanvayānnāsaṅgatārthakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1524: cāṭuṣvityādi dṛśyanta ityantamekaṃ vākyamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1529: locanam tatra preyānalaṅkāro yatra sa preyolaṅkāro 'laṅkaraṇīya ihoktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1533: udbhaṭamatānusāriṇastu bhaṅktvā vyācakṣate---cāṭuṣu cāṭuviṣaye vākyarthatve cāṭūnāṃ vākyārthatve preyolaṅkārasyāpi viṣaya iti pūrvoṇa sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1534: udbhaṭamate hi bhāvālaṅkāra eva preya ityuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1537: rasavacchabdena preyaḥśabdena ca sarva eva rasavadādyalaṅkārā upalakṣitāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1538: tadevāha---rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyanta iti uktaviṣaya iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1541: adya yā mama govinda jātā tvayi gṛhāgate //
GK16andhvc2u:1545: cāṭusthale 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau varṇyamānanarapatiprabhāvādereva vākyārthatā na tu preyorūpālaṅkārasyetyataḥ tatpadaṃ bahuvrīhitvāśrayeṇa vyācaṣṭe---preyānityādi
GK16andhvc2u:1551: aho narapateḥ prabhāvo yenaivaṃ durdaśā ripustrijano 'nubhavatīti prabhāvālambitāyāḥ prīteḥ ripustrījanavṛttāntaviṣayakatvāccamatkāritvaṃ bodhyam
GK16andhvc2u:1573: anubhāvādītyādiśabdena vibhāvavyabhicārisvaśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamatra bhāvanāmalaṅkārateti ca tadvyākhyātā pratīhārendurājaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1577: sa ca rasādiralaṅkāraḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇī vā /
GK16andhvc2u:1578: tatrādyo yathā--- kiṃ hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punaḥ prāptaścirādṛrśanaṃ keyaṃ niṣkaruma pravāsarucitā kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1579: svapnānteṣviti te vadan priyatamavyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā roditi riktabāhuvalayastāraṃ ripustrījanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1592: svapnānteṣu svapnāyiteṣu suptapralatiteṣu punaḥpunarudbhūtatayā bahuṣviti vadanyuṣmākaṃ sambandhī ripustrījanaḥ bālapriyā prayeśśabdeneti /
GK16andhvc2u:1605: tatra rasavadalaṅkāraḥ bhāvālaṅkāraśca sta ityudabhaṭamatānurodhena paṅktyartha iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1628: locanam priyatame viśeṣemāsaktaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yena tādṛśa eva san buddhvā śūnyavalayākārīkṛtabāhupāśaḥ san tāraṃ muktakaṇṭhaṃ roditīti /
GK16andhvc2u:1629: atra śokasthāyibhāvena svapnadarśanoddīpitena karuṇarasena carvyamāṇena sundarībhūto narapatiprabhāvo bhātīti karuṇaḥ śuddha evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1630: na hi tvayā ripavo hatā iti yādṛganalaṅkṛto 'yaṃ vākyārthastādṛgayam,
GK16andhvc2u:1633: candrādinā vastunā tathā vastvantaraṃ vadanādyalaṅkriyate tadupamitatvena cārutayāvabhāsāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1634: tathā rasenāpi vastu vā rasāntaraṃ vopaskṛtaṃ sundaraṃ bhāti iti rasasyāpi vastuna ivālaṅkāratve ko virodhaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1638: rasenāpi tarhi sarasīkriyate so 'rtha iti svasaṃvedyametat /
GK16andhvc2u:1639: tena yatkecidacūcudan--'atra rasena vibhāvādīnāṃ madhye kimalaṅkriyate' iti tadanabhyupagamaparāhatam;
GK16andhvc2u:1641: asyārthasya bhūyasā lakṣye bālapriyā bahuṣviti bahuvacanārthavivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:1644: 'atra narapatiprabhāvaḥ tathāvidhena karuṇarasena sundarībhūto bhātī'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1671: 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau varṇitena ripustrījanavṛttāntena taddhetubhūtapriyatamavināśapratyāyanadvārā narapatiprabhāvaḥ pratyāyyata iti sa eva prastutārthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1675: saṅkīrṇo rasādiraṅgabhūto yathā---- kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadārno 'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:1681: avadhūta iti na pratīpsitaḥ bālapriyā kṣipta ityādyamarukastham /
GK16andhvc2u:1683: āliṅganyo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1684: ityatra tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatver irṣyāvipralambhasya śloṣasahitasyāṅgabhāva iti,
GK16andhvc2u:1686: ata eva cerṣyāvipralambhakaruṇayoraṅgatvena vyavasthānātsamāveśo na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1692: yadyapyatra karuṇo raso vāstavo 'pyasti tathāpi sataccārutvapratītyai na vyāpriyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇa śleṣasahitasyetyetāvadevā vocat na tu karumasahitasyetyapi /
GK16andhvc2u:1698: yadi hyanyatarasya rasasya prādhānyamabhaviṣyanna dvitīyo rasaḥ samāviśet /
GK16andhvc2u:1700: sa ca śokasthāyibhāvatvena nirapekṣabhāvasya karuṇasya viruddha eva /
GK16andhvc2u:1701: evamalaṅkāraśabdaprasaṅgena samāveśaṃ prasādhya bālapriyā 'śarāgniḥ vaḥ duritaṃ dahatvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1702: sa kaḥ? ya ārdraḥ tatkalabhavaḥ aparādho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1736: tatra sarvāsāmalaṅkṛtīnāmityasya yatra hi rasasya vākyārthībhāvastatra kathamalaṅkāratvam?
GK16andhvc2u:1741: locanam evaṃvidha eveti yaduktaṃ tatraivakārasyābhiprāyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yatra hīti /
GK16andhvc2u:1743: athaṃ bhāvaḥ---upamādīnāmalaṅkāratve yādṛśī vārtā tādṛśyeva rasādīnām /
GK16andhvc2u:1782: teṣāṃ yadaucityaṃ tatsūcanātmatayā tatsūcanasvabhāvakatayā tattadalaṅkārā hyasyethaṃ cittavṛttiruciteti sūcayanti;
GK16andhvc2u:1783: yathā yuvajanaśarīragatā hārakaṭakakuṇḍalādayaḥ tadrāgitvasyaucityaṃ yattiśarīragatā daṇḍakaṣāyavastrādayastadvairāgyasyaucityaṃ ceti tatsūcakatvenetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1785: tasmādyatra rasādayo vākyārthībhūtāḥ sa sarvaḥ na rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1788: yatra tu prādhānyenārthāntarasya vākyārthībhāve rasādibhiścārutvaniṣpattiḥ kriyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1790: evaṃ dhvanerupamādīnāṃ rasavadalaṅkārasya ca vibhaktaviṣayatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1791: yadi tu cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo rasādyalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate locanam śavaśarīraṃ kuṇḍalādyupetamapi na bhāti,
GK16andhvc2u:1795: na hi dehasya kiñcidanaucityamiti vastuta ātmaivālaṅkāryaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1804: yatra rasasyālaṅkāryatā rasāntaraṃ cāṅgabhūtaṃ nāsti tatra śuddhā evopamādayaḥ tena saṃsṛṣṭyā nopamādīnāṃ viṣayāpahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1812: yaterātmanaśca rāgitvamanucitamityato yatiśarīragatāḥ kaṭakādayo hāsyāvahā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1813: tattaccetanaśarīragataiḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādibhiḥ sūcyasya rāgitvādicittavṛttiviśeṣasya tattaccetanocitatve teṣāmalaṅkāratā,
GK16andhvc2u:1818: na tu samānādhikaraṇe tatpade iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1820: rasādiniṣṭhā yā alaṅkāratā alaṅkriyākartṛtvaṃ rasādikartṛkālaṅkriyeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:1821: sa eva tasyā viṣaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1826: sa sarvo na rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣaya iti vākya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1837: locanam tatra bhāvālaṅktārasya śuddhasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā--- tava śatapatrapatramṛdutāmratalaścaramaścalakalahaṃsanūpurakaladhvaninā mukharaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:1838: mahiṣamahāsurasya śirasi prasabhaṃ nihitaḥ kanakamahāmahīdhragurutāṃ kathamamba gataḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1841: rasābhāsasyālaṅkāratā yathā mamaiva stotre--- samastaguṇasampadaḥ samamalaṅkriyāṇāṃ gaṇair-- bhavanti yadi bhūṣaṇaṃ tava tathāpi no śobhase
GK16andhvc2u:1842: śivaṃ hṛdayavallabhaṃ yadi yathā tathā rañjayeḥ tadeva nanu vāṇi te bhavati sarvalalokottaram //
GK16andhvc2u:1843: atra hi parameśastutimātraṃ vācaḥ paramopādeyamiti vākyārthe śṛṅgārābhāsaścārutvahetuḥ śloṣasahitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1844: na hyayaṃ pūrṇaḥ śṛṅgāro nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1852: tasya patramiva mṛṭu tāmraṃ ca talamadhobhāgo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1853: calakalahaṃsatulyo nūpuraḥ tasya dhvaninā mukharaḥ sa śabdaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1857: kanakamayo mahāṃśca yo mahīdhraḥ parvataḥ sumeruḥ tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:1866: tathāpi mṛdutāmratala ityetāvanmātroktāvapi vitarkādeḥ sambhavādupamāyāstadaṅgatvābhāvāttadasaṅkīrṇatvarūpaṃ śuddhatvaṃ sughaṭam /
GK16andhvc2u:1869: nanu vāṇi / samastānāṃ guṇānāṃ mādhuryādīnāmatha ca saundaryādīnāṃ sampadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1885: nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca sati śṛṅgāraḥ pūrṇo na bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:1886: ato 'yaṃ tarhyupamādīnāṃ praviralaviṣayatā nirviṣayatā vābhihitā syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1888: atha satyāmapi tasyāṃ yatrācetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo nāsau rasavadalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1889: tat mahataḥ kāvyaprabandhasya rasanidhānabhūtasya nīrasatvamabhihitaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1891: bhāvābhāsāṅgatā yathā--- sa pātu vo yasya hatāvaśeṣāstattulyavarṇāñjanarañjiteṣu /
GK16andhvc2u:1896: parasya cāyamāśayaḥ---acetanānāṃ cittavṛttirūparasādyasambhavāttadvarṇane rasavadalaṅkārasyānāśaṅkyatvāttadvibhakta evopamādīnāṃ viṣaya iti
GK16andhvc2u:1904: yatra hi rasastatrāvaśyaṃ rasavadalaṅkāra iti paramatam /
GK16andhvc2u:1905: tato na rasavadalaṅkāraścennūnaṃ tatra raso nāstīti paramatābhiprāyānnīrasatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc2u:1917: tatrrāsasya bhagavatprabhāvavibhāvitāyāṃ ratau guṇībhāvādbhāvābhāsa ūrjasvyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1942: mata iti taraṅgabhrūbhaṅgā kṣubhitavihagaśreṇiraśanā vikarṣantī phenaṃ vasanamiva saṃrambhaśithilam /
GK16andhvc2u:1943: yathāviddhaṃ yāti skhalitamabhisandhāya bahuśo nadīrūpeṇeyaṃ dhruvamasahanā sā pariṇatā //
GK16andhvc2u:1944: yathā va--- tanvī meghajalārdrapallavatayā dhautādharevāśrubhiḥ śūnyevābharaṇaiḥ svakālavirahādviśrāntapuṣpodnamā /
GK16andhvc2u:1946: taraṅgā eva bhrūbhaṅgā yasyāḥ vikarṣantāṃ vilambamānaṃ balādākṣipantī /
GK16andhvc2u:1950: atha ca madviyogapaścāttāpā sahiṣṇustāpaśāntaye nadībhāvaṃ gateti /
GK16andhvc2u:1977: evaṃ kṣubhitavihāgaśreṇireva raśanā yasyā iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1988: ata eva pādapatitaṃ māmavadhūya tiraskṛtya sthitā /
GK16andhvc2u:1994: meghajālairārdrāḥ pallavā yasyāṃ tasya bhāvaḥ tattā,
GK16andhvc2u:1995: tayā hetunā aśrubhiḥ dhautaḥ adharo yasyāḥ sā iva /
GK16andhvc2u:1999: cintā maunamivāśritā madhukṛtāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sa //
GK16andhvc2u:2000: yathā vā---- teṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdāṃ rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇāṃ kṣemaṃ bhadra kalindaśailatanayātīre latāveśmanām /
GK16andhvc2u:2001: vicchinne smaratalpakalpanamṛducchedopayoge 'dhunā te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vigalannīlatviṣaḥ pallavāḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:2003: kimiti pādapatitamapi dayitamavadhūtavatyahamiti ca cintayā maunam /
GK16andhvc2u:2005: etau ślokau nadīlatāvarṇanaparau tātparyeṇa purūravasa unmādākrāntasyoktirūpau /
GK16andhvc2u:2007: he bhadra / teṣamiti ye mamaiva hṛdaye sthitāsteṣām /
GK16andhvc2u:2011: kalindaśailatanayā yamunā tasyāstīre latāgṛhāṇāṃ kṣemaṃ kuśalamiti kākvā praśnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2013: dvārakāgato bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ---smaratalpasya madanaśayyāyāḥ kalpanārthaṃ mṛdu sukumāraṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2015: atha ca smaratalpe yatkalpanaṃ klṝptiḥ sa eva mṛduḥ sukumāra utkṛṣṭaśchedopayogastroṭanaphalaṃ tasminvicchinne /
GK16andhvc2u:2026: gopeti gopadarśanena prabuddhā udbuddhāḥ saṃskārāḥ latāveśmādyanubhavajanitāḥ saṃskārā yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2043: svasya gopīnāṃ ca yaḥ ityevamādau viṣaye 'cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāve 'pi cetanavastuvṛttāntayojanāstyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:2045: tadevaṃ satyupamādayo nirviṣayāḥ praviralaviṣayā vā syuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2048: mayi tu sannihite 'navaratakathitopayogānneme jarājīrṇatākhilīkāraṃ kadācidavāpnuvantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2054: nanu yatra cetanavṛttasya sarvathā nānupraveśaḥ sa upamāderviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha--yasmādityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2058: atijaḍo 'pi candrodyānaprabhṛtiḥ svaviśrānto 'pi varṇyamāno 'vaśyaṃ cittavṛttivibhāvatāṃ tyaktvā bālapriyā parasparālambano 'nurāgaḥ tanniścayagarbhamevetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2059: tanniścayābhāve vakṣyamāṇamanupaṃpannaṃ bhavet gopīnāṃ puruṣāntararamaṇe tadupayogasambhavāditi /
GK16andhvc2u:2064: anavarato yaḥ kathitopayogaḥ pūrvoktopayogaḥ tasya yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:2083: 'yatrāntato vibhāvatvena cetanavastuvṛttāntayojanā nāsti asāvacetanavastuvṛttānto nāstī'ti vṛttānvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2096: yaḥ punaraṅgī raso bhāvo vā sarvākāramalaṅkāryaḥ sa dhvanerātmeti /
GK16andhvc2u:2098: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2099: aṅgāśritās tv alaṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvK_2.6 //
GK16andhvc2u:2102: yetamarthaṃ rasādilakṣaṇamaṅginaṃ santamavalambante te gumāḥ śauryādivat /
GK16andhvc2u:2107: yataḥ parokto viṣayavibhāgo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2121: kevalaṃ prathamābhiprāye prathamaṃ kārikārdhaṃ dṛṣṭāntābhiprāyeṇa vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc2u:2126: na hi tadasti vastu yanna kiñjiccittavṛttiviśeṣamudbodhayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2154: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2155: tan-mayaṃ kāvyam āśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati // DhvK_2.7 //
GK16andhvc2u:2156: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2159: tatkathamuktaṃ rasādikamaṅginaṃ guṇā āśritā ityāśaṅkyāha--tatā cetyadi /
GK16andhvc2u:2163: ratau hi samastadevatiryaṅnarādijātiṣvavicchinnaiva vāsanāsta iti na kaścittatra tādṛgyo na hṛdayasaṃvādamayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2166: madhuro hi śarkarādiraso vivekino 'vivekināṃ v svasthasyāturasya vā jhaṭiti rasanānipatitastāvadabhilaṣaṇīya eva bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:2168: sa śṛṅgāra ātmatvena prakṛto yatra vyaṅgyatayā /
GK16andhvc2u:2195: kārikāyāṃ madhura ityādinā ayamartho 'pi dṛṣṭāntavidhayā vivakṣita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2200: tanmayamityatra “tatprakṛtavacane mayaḍi“ti sūtreṇa mayaḍiti vyācaṣṭe--sa ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2202: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--vastuto mādhuryaṃ nāma śṛṅgārāde rasasyaiva guṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2213: mādhuryam ārdratāṃ yāti yatas tatrādhikaṃ manaḥ // DhvK_2.8 //
GK16andhvc2u:2216: locanam vyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayorupacaritaṃ madhuraśṛṅgārarasābhivyaktisamarthatā śabdārthayormādhuryamiti hi lakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:2223: 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ' ityatra hi śravyatvamasamastatvaṃ cāstyeveti bhāvaḥ // 7 //
GK16andhvc2u:2225: tato 'pi madhuratamaḥ karuma iti tadabhivyañjanakauśalaṃ śabdārthayorbhadhurataratvaṃ madhuratamatvaṃ cetyabhiprāyeṇāha--śṛṅgāra ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2230: sahṛdayasya cetaḥ svābhāvikamanāviṣṭatvātmakaṃ kāṭhinyaṃ krodhādidoptarūpatvaṃ bālapriyā śṛṅgāreti /
GK16andhvc2u:2255: tatpadena madhuratarasya madhuratamasya ca rasasya parāmarśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2271: raudrādayo hi rasāḥ parāṃ dīptimujjavalatāṃ janayantīti lakṣaṇayā ta locanam vismayahāsādirāgitvaṃ ca tyajatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2273: krameṇetyāśayaḥ tena karuṇe 'pi sarvathaiva cittaṃ dravatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:2278: api tvātmabhūtasya rasasyaiva paramārthato guṇā mādhuryādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2289: tathā cārdratā nā cittasya śṛṅgārādicarvaṇājanyaḥ kāṭhinyādiparityāgaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2311: uttataratra ” hāsyabhayānakabībhatsaśānteṣvi“tyatra “bībhatse 'pyevami“tyatra ca bībhatsapadasthāne adbhatapadaṃ ca paṭhanīyaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:2313: tatra śānte mādhuryamātrakathanaṃ matāntarābhiprāyeṇa yojyamiti pratibhāti /
GK16andhvc2u:2315: vikāsarūpo yo vistāraḥ tadrūpaṃ yatprajvalanaṃ tatsvabhāva tatsvarūpā dīptirnāma tathāvidhā eva dīptirityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2318: tayā dīptyā āsvādaviśeṣātmikayā kāryarūpayā lakṣyante rasāntarātpṛthaktayā /
GK16andhvc2u:2320: tato lakṣitalakṣaṇayā tatprakāśanaparaḥ śabdo dīrghasamāsaracanavākyarūpo 'pi dīptirityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2345: tatprakāśanaparaḥ śabda ityasyaiva viviraṇaṃ dīrghetyādīti sphuṭīkartumāha--dīrgheti /
GK16andhvc2u:2346: dīptirityucyata iti yathā---- cañcadbhujabhramitacaṇḍagadābhidhāta-- sañcūrṇitoruyugalasya suyodhanasya /
GK16andhvc2u:2352: cañcadbhyāṃ vegādāvartamānābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ bhramitā yeyaṃ caṇḍā dāruṇā gadā tayā
GK16andhvc2u:2353: yo 'bhitaḥ sarvata ūrvorghātastena samyak cūrṇitaṃ punaranutthānopahataṃ kṛtamūruyugalaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2354: yugapadevorudvayaṃ yasya taṃ suyodhanamanādṛtyaiva styānenāśyānatayā na tu kālāntaraśuṣkatayāvabaddhaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2356: rudhiraṃ tena śoṇau lohitau pāṇī yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2359: yasyāstattadapamānajātaṃ kṛtaṃ devyanucitamapi tasyāstava kacānuttaṃsayiṣyatyuttaṃsavataḥ kariṣyati,
GK16andhvc2u:2361: devītyanena kulakalatrakhilīkārasmaramakāriṇā krodhasyaivoddīpanavibhāvatvaṃ kṛtamiti nātra śṛṅgāraśaṅkā kartavyā /
GK16andhvc2u:2397: yathā---- yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibhirti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camunāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16andhvc2u:2398: yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamapi jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham //
GK16andhvc2u:2400: locanam tāvatyeva madhye viśrāntimalabhamānā cūrṇitorudvayasuyodhanānādaraṇaparyantā pratītirektvenaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:2402: anye tusuyodhanasya sambandhi yatstyānā vabaddhaṃ ghanaṃ śoṇitaṃ tena śoṇapāṇiriti vyācakṣte /
GK16andhvc2u:2405: pāñcālarājaputrema dhṛṣṭadyumnena droṇasya vyāpādanāttatkulaṃ pratyadhikaḥ krodhāveśo 'śvatthāmnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2407: rame saṅkagrāme yaḥ pratīpaṃ pratikūlaṃ kṛtvāste sa evaṃ vidho yadi sakalajagadantako
GK16andhvc2u:2408: bhavati tasyāpyahamantakaḥ kimutānyasya manuṣyasya devasya bālapriyā drutaṃ sasaṃhitamuccaritatvenāvicchinnavegaśālitvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2417: ekaghana iva bhātīti ca pāṭhaḥ auddhatyasyeti /
GK16andhvc2u:2427: samarpakatvaṃ kāvyasya yat tu sarva-rasān prati /
GK16andhvc2u:2428: sa prasādo guṇo jñeyaḥ sarva-sādhāraṇa-kriyaḥ // DhvK_2.10 //
GK16andhvc2u:2432: atra pṛthagbhūtaireva kramādvimṛśyamānairarthaiḥ padātpadaṃ krodhaḥ parāṃ dhārāmāśrita ityasamastataiva dīptinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc2u:2433: evaṃ mādhuryadīptī parasparapratidvandvitayā sthite śṛṅgārādiraudrādigate iti pradarśayatā tatsamāveśavaicitryaṃ hāsyabhayānakabībhatsaśānteṣu darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:2434: hāsyasya śṛṅgārāṅgatayā mādhuryaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vikāsadharmatayā caujo 'pi prakṛṣṭamiti sāmyaṃ dvayoḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2435: bhayānakasya magnacittavṛttisvabhāvatve 'pi vibhāvasya dīptatayā ojaḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ māghuryamalpam /
GK16andhvc2u:2437: śānte tu vibhāvavaicitryātkadācidojaḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ kadācinmādhuryamiti vibhāgaḥ //9//
GK16andhvc2u:2438: samarpaktvaṃ samyagarpaktvaṃ hṛdayasaṃvādena pratipattṝn prati svātmāveśena vyāpārakatvaṃ jhaṭiti śuṣkakāṣṭhāgnidṛṣṭāntena /
GK16andhvc2u:2439: akaluṣodakadṛṣṭantena ca tadakāluṣyaṃ prasannatvaṃ bālapriyā iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc2u:2473: samarpakatvaṃ tu yat pratipattṛhṛdaye sarvarasakarmakaṃ jhaṭiti yadarpaṇaṃ vyāpanarūpaṃ tatkartṛtvaṃ tu yaditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:2474: saḥ sarvasādhāraṇī kriyā vartanarūpā yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2486: yathā vā akaluṣaṃ svacchaṃ vastrādi udakaṃ jhaṭiti vyāpnoti tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2490: sa ca sarvarasasādhāraṇo guṇaḥ sarvaracanāsādhāraṇaśca vyaṅgyārthāpekṣayaiva mukhyatayā vyavasthito mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2492: upacārāttu tathāvidhe vyaṅgye 'rthe yacchabdārthayoḥ samarpaktvaṃ tadapi prasādaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2494: nanu rasagato gumastatkathaṃ śabdārthayoḥ svacchatetyāśaṅkyāha---sa ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:2498: sarvāyeyaṃ racanā śabdagatā cārthagatā ca samastā cāsamastā ca tatra sādhāramaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2500: arthasya tāvatsamarpaktvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ pratyeva sambhavati nānyathā /
GK16andhvc2u:2501: śabdasyāpi svavācyārpaktvaṃ nāma kiyadalaukikaṃ yena gumaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2502: evaṃ mādhuryaujaḥprasādā eva trayo guṇā upapannā bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:2503: te ca pratipattrāsvādamayā mukhyatayā tata āsvādye upacaritā rase tatastadvyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayoriti tātparyam // 10 //
GK16andhvc2u:2504: bālaprayā nanvevaṃ prasādo guṇaḥ kāvyaniṣṭhatvena kathamukta ityata āha---upacārādityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2516: sa eva sarvarasasādhāraṇo guṇa iti dvedhāvadhāraṇamatretyāha---sarvetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2530: kintu rasasyaiva svātmāveśena jhaṭiti sahṛdayahṛdayavyāpakatvamato mukhyatayā rasaniṣṭha eva prasādākhyo guṇaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2541: tattadāsvādāḥ tattadrasacarvaṇājanyā ityāsvādyetattadrase te upacaritā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2545: śruti-duṣṭādayo doṣā anityā ye ca darśitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2546: dhvany-ātmany eva śṛṅgāre te heyā ity udāhṛtāḥ // DhvK_2.11 //
GK16andhvc2u:2547: śrutiduṣṭādayo doṣā anityā ye ca darśitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2549: anityā doṣāśca ye śrutiduṣṭādayaḥ sūcitāste 'pi na vātye arthamātre,
GK16andhvc2u:2550: na ca vyaṅgye śṛṅgāvyatirekiṇi śṛṅgāre vā dhvaneranātmamūte /
GK16andhvc2u:2551: kiṃ tarhi? dhvanyātmanyeva śṛṅgāre 'ṅgitayā vyaṅgye te heyā ityudāhṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2554: locanam evamasmatpakṣa eva guṇālaṅkāravyavahāro vibhāgenopapadyata iti pradarśya nityānityadoṣavibhāgo 'pyasmatpakṣa eva saṅgacchata iti darśayitumāha---śrutiduṣṭādaya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2564: na tveṣāṃ viṣayavibhāgapradarśanenānityatvaṃ bālapriyā “śrutiduṣṭārthaduṣṭe ca kalpanāduṣṭamityapi /
GK16andhvc2u:2592: tasyāṅgānāṃ prabhedā ye prabhedāḥ svagatāś ca ye /
GK16andhvc2u:2594: tasyāṅgānāṃ prabhedā ye prabhedāḥ svagatāśca ye /
GK16andhvc2u:2596: aṅgitā vyaṅgyo rasādirvivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvanereka ātmā ya uktastasyāṅganāṃ
GK16andhvc2u:2597: vācyavācakānupātināmalaṅkārāṇāṃ ye prabhedā niravadhayo ye ca svagatāstasyāṅgino
GK16andhvc2u:2599: anantāḥ svāśrayāpekṣayā niḥ--- locanam bhinnavṛttādidoṣebhyo viviktaṃ pradarśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:2601: bībhatsahāsyalaudrādau tveṣāmasmābhirupagamāt śṛṅgārādau ca varjanādanityatvaṃ ca doṣatvaṃ ca samarthitameveti /
GK16andhvc2u:2605: ātmagatāḥ sambhogavipralambhādyā ātmīyagatā vibhāvādigatāsteṣāṃ loṣṭaprastāreṇāṅgāṅgibhāve kā gaṇaneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2616: 'heyā ityudāhṛtā' ityasya 'te 'pi na vācye 'rthamātre' ityādivākyatrayeṇāpi sambandhaśca bodhyaḥ // 11 //
GK16andhvc2u:2618: alaṅkārāṇāṃ rasādyaṅgatvamevamupapāditaṃ kāvyapradīpodyote “ramaṇīyā apyarthāstucchaśabdenābhidhīyamānā na tathā camatkārāya ityanuprāsādayaḥ śabdadvārema rasādyupakārakāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:2621: alaṅkārā hi vibhāvādyutkarṣayanto bahudhoddīpanāḥ kvacidanubhāvā api yathā nāyakādikṛtanāyikādivarṇana ityapyāhuri“ti /
GK16andhvc2u:2634: sīmāno viśeṣāsteṣāmanyonyasambandhandhaparikalpane kriyamāṇe kasyacidanyatamasyāpi rasasya prakārāḥ parisaṅkhyātuṃ na śakyante kimuta sarveṣām
GK16andhvc2u:2635: tathā hi śṛṅgārasyāṅginastāvadādyau dvau bhedau-sambhogo vipralambhaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:2642: na tu pūrvaṃ ratnāvalyāḥ tadā hi bālapriyā 'vipralambhasyāpī'tyādigranthaṃ vivṛṇoti---abhilāṣavipralambha ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2644: idaṃ ratnāvalīnāṭikāyāṃ vidūṣakaṃ prati vatsarājasya vacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:2648: etadvacanaśravaṇenaiva rājñaḥ svasminnanurāgasya ratnāvalyā niścayāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2653: teṣāṃ ci deśakālādyāśrayāvasthābheda iti svagatabhedāpekṣayaikasya tasyāparimeyatvam,
GK16andhvc2u:2659: punaḥ khaṇḍitayā prasādyamānayāpi prasādamagṛhṇantyā tataḥ paścāttāpaparītatvena virahotkaṇṭhitayā saha mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2662: vañcanāyāṃ hyabhilaṣito viṣayo na labhyate; evamatra /
GK16andhvc2u:2665: āśrayo malayādiḥ mārutādīnāṃ vibhāvānāmiti yaducyate taddeśaśabdena gatārtham /
GK16andhvc2u:2667: yathā mamaiva--- dayitayā grathitā sragiyaṃ mayā hṛdayadhāmani nityaniyojitā /
GK16andhvc2u:2686: vṛttau 'teṣāṃ ca pratyekam' iti 'teṣāṃ ca deśe'tyubhayatra sthiteteṣāmiti pade krameṇa vivṛṇoti---ekatretyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2687: deśakālāśrayāvasthābheda ityatrāśrayapadasya keṣāñcidvyākhyānaṃ na yuktamityāha---āśraya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2699: diṅmātrakathanena hi vyutpannānāṃ sahṛdayānāmekatrāpi rasabhede sahālaṅkārairaṅgāṅgibhāvaparijñānādāsāditālokā buddhiḥ sarvatraiva bhaviṣyati
GK16andhvc2u:2702: sarveṣv eva prabhedeṣu nānuprāsaḥ prakāśakaḥ // DhvK_2.14 //
GK16andhvc2u:2706: prabhedāsteṣu sarveṣvekaprakārānubandhi tayā prabandhena pravṛtto 'nuprāso na vyañjakaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2719: ekarūpaṃ tvanubandhaṃ tyaktvā vicitro 'nuprāso nibadhyamāno na doṣāyetyekarūpagrahaṇam // 14 //
GK16andhvc2u:2722: śabdabhaṅgana bālapriyā virahapīḍāhetubhūtāyā api srajo dayitāgrathanarūpakāraṇaviśeṣādvirahapīḍāparihārakasudhārasasrāvakatvamuktamiti kāraṇakṛto bhedaḥ // 12 //
GK16andhvc2u:2731: śaktāv api pramāditvaṃ vipralambhe viśeṣataḥ // DhvK_2.15 //
GK16andhvc2u:2733: dhvanerātmabhūtaḥ śṛṅgārastātparyeṇa vācyavācakābhyāṃ prakāśyamānastasminyamakādīnāṃ yamakaprakārāṇāṃ nibandhanaṃ duṣkaraśabdabhaṅgaśleṣādīnāṃ śaktāvapi pramāditvam /
GK16andhvc2u:2734: 'pramāditvā'mityanenaitaddṛśyate---kākatālīyena kadācitkasyacidekasya yamakāderniṣpattāvapi bhūmnālaṅkārāntaravadrasāṅgatvena nibandho na kartavya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2736: tasmindyotye yamakāderaṅgasya nibandho niyamānna kartavya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2749: rasasamavadhānena vibhāvādighaṭanāmeva bālapriyā vṛttau 'yamakādīnām' ityasya vyakhyānaṃ 'yamakaprakārāṇām' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2755: abhaṅgaśleṣo 'rthaśleṣaśca prācāṃ mate eka eveti sphaṣṭaṃ kāvyapradīpādau /
GK16andhvc2u:2760: aśokapadaṃ rūḍhyā vṛkṣaviśeṣaṃ śabdabhaṅgena nāsti śoko yasyeti yogavyutpatyā śokarahitaṃ ca vaktīti bhāvaḥvṛttau---'śaktāvapi pramāditvam' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2761: ” avyutpattikṛto doṣaḥ śaktyā saṃvriyate kave“riti vakṣyamāṇatvena doṣatirodhāyakaśaktau
GK16andhvc2u:2765: 'rase'ti 'dhvanāvi'ti ca sāmānyokteḥ tātparyaṃ darśayan kārikāṃ vyācaṣṭe---rasetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2770: niṣpattāvāścaryabhūto 'pi yasyālaṅkārasya rasākṣiptatayaiva bandhaḥ śakyakriyo locanam kurvaṃstunnāntarīyakatayā yamāsādayati sa evātrālaṅkāro rasamārge, nānyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2771: tenavīrādbhutādiraseṣvapi yamakādi kaveḥ pratipattuśca rasavighnākāryeva sarvatra /
GK16andhvc2u:2772: gaḍaḍurikāpravāhopahatasahṛdayadhurādhirohaṇavihīnalokāvarjanābhipirāyeṇa tu mayā śṛṅgāre vipralambhe ca viśeṣata ityuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2773: tathā ca 'rase 'ṅgatvaṃ tasmādeṣāṃ na vidyate' iti sāmānyena vakṣyati /
GK16andhvc2u:2794: tasyāḥ pravāheṇa avicchedena upahatāḥ naṣṭavivekāḥ tathā sahṛdayadhurādhirohaṇena vihīnāśca ye lokāḥ janāstadāvarjanābhiprāyeṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2810: anubhāvo niśvāsādiḥ tasya carvamā punaḥ punaranusandhān /
GK16andhvc2u:2830: yathā---- kapole pattrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2831: muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnastaralayati bāṣpastanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam //
GK16andhvc2u:2832: rasāṅgatve ca tasya lakṣaṇamapṛthagyatnanirvartyatvamiti yo rasaṃ bandhumadhyavasitasya kaveralaṅkārastāṃ vāsanāmatyūhya yatnāntaramāsthitasya niṣpadyate sa na rasāṅgamiti /
GK16andhvc2u:2833: yamake ca prabandhena buddhipūrvakaṃ kriyamāṇe niyamenaiva yatnāntaraparigraha āpatati śabdaviśeṣānveṣaṇarūpaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2835: alaṅkārāntarāṇi hi nirūpapyamāṇadurghaṭanānyapi rasasamāhitacetasaḥ locanam lakṣamamiti /
GK16andhvc2u:2842: tathā nirūpyamāṇe durghaṭanāni kathametāni racitānītyevaṃ vismayāvahānītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2843: bālapriyā prakṛte tatpadena vyāpakamātraṃ vivakṣitamityāha---vyāpakamityartha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2845: apṛthagyatnanirvartyatvamalaṅkārasya rasāṅgatvavyāpakamiti 'rasāṅgatva' ityādi vṛtyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2846: uktamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ vyatirekaṃ darśayati vṛttau'yo rasam' ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2857: asya 'buddhipūrvakam' ityanenānvayabhramaḥ syādato 'nvayaṃ darśayati locane---kriyamāṇa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:2863: yathā ca māyārāmaśirodarśanena vihvalāyāṃ sītādevyāṃ setau /
GK16andhvc2u:2872: aṅgitayā tu vyaṅgye rase nāṅgatvaṃ pṛthakprayatnanirvartyatvādyamakādeḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2873: asyaivārthasya saṅgrahaślokāḥ---- rasavanti hi vastūni sālaṅkārāṇi kānicit /
GK16andhvc2u:2890: 'dhvanyātmabhūte śṛṅgāre iti yaduktaṃ tat prādhānyanārdhaślokena saṅgṛhīte dhvanyātmabhūta iti // 16 //
GK16andhvc2u:2917: sa sarvo 'pi yadi samīkṣya viniveśyate tadalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dhvaneraṅginaḥ sarvasyaiva cārutvaheturniṣpadyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2946: tanmahāvākyamadhye codāharamāvakāśamudāhalaraṇasvarūpaṃ tadyojanaṃ tatsamarthanaṃ ca nirūpayituṃ granthāntaramati vṛtigranthasya sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:2953: samīkṣāyāḥ ko 'tra prastāva ityata āha locane---samīkṣyetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:2960: yathā---- calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatīṃ rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2961: karau vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara hastāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī //
GK16andhvc2u:2965: vayamevaṃvidhābhilāṣacāṭupravaṇā api tattvānveṣamādvastuvṛtte 'nviṣyamāṇe hatā āyāsamātrapātrībhūtā jātāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2966: tvaṃ khalviti nipātenāyatnasiddhaṃ tataiva caritārthatvamiti śakuntalāṃ pratyabhilāṣiṇo duṣyantasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2969: kathaṃ nu haṭhādanicchantatyā api paricumbanaṃ vidheyāsmeti yadasmākaṃ manorājyapadavīmadhiśete tattavāyatnasiddham /
GK16andhvc2u:2970: bhramaro hi nīlotpaladhiyā tadāśaṅkākarīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ punaḥpunaḥ spṛśati /
GK16andhvc2u:2990: kadācidrasāditātparyeṇa vivakṣito 'pi hmalaṅkāraḥ kaścidaṅgitvena vivakṣito dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc2u:2993: atra hi paryāyoktasyāṅgitvena vivakṣā rasāditātparye satyapīti /
GK16andhvc2u:2995: cakrābhighāta eva prasabhājñā alaṅghanīyo niyogastayā yo rāhudayitānāṃ ratotsavaṃ cumbanamātraśeṣaṃ cakāra /
GK16andhvc2u:2996: yata āliṅganamuddāmaṃ pradhānaṃ yeṣu vilāseṣu tairvandhyaḥ śūnyo 'sau ratotsavaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3031: tathā ca paryāyoktasya prādhānye 'pi na kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3046: avasare gṛhītiryathā----- uddāmotkalikāṃ vipāṇḍurarucaṃ prārabdhajṛmbhāṃ kṣaṇā- dāyāsaṃ śvasanodgamairaviralairātanvatīmātmanaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3047: adyodyānalatāmimāṃ samadanāṃ nārīmivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmyaham //
GK16andhvc2u:3048: locanam tathā ca granthakāra evamagre darśayiṣyati /
GK16andhvc2u:3049: mahātmanāṃ dūṣaṇoddhoṣaṇamātmana eva dūṣaṇamiti nedaṃ dūṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ dattam /
GK16andhvc2u:3055: saha madanākhyena vṛkṣaviśeṣema madanena kāmena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:3056: atropamāśleṣar irṣyāvipralambhasya bhāvino mārgapariśodhaktvena sthitastaccarvaṇābhimukhyaṃ kurvannavasare rasasya pramukhībhāvadaśāyāṃ puraḥsarāyamāṇo gṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3061: svaparigṛhītāṃ nabamālikālatāṃ dohadaviśeṣeṇa puṣpitāmavagatavato vatsarājasya narmasacivaṃ prati vacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:3062: 'ahamadya imāmudyānalatāmanyāṃ nārīmiva paśyan devyā mukhaṃ kopavipāṭaladyuti kariṣyāmī'tyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3064: tatpaśyantyā svaparigṛhītamādhavīlatāyāḥ puṣpodgamābhāvena janitakopāyā vāsavadattāyā mukhamātāmradyupi yathā bhaviṣyati tathā kariṣyāmītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3066: uttarārdhasya spaṣṭārthakatvaṃ manyamānaḥ pūrvārdhaṃ vyācaṣṭe---uddāmā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3090: yathā---- raktastvaṃ navapallavairahamapi ślādhyaiḥ priyāyā guṇai- stvāmāyānti śilīmukhāḥ smaradhanurmuktāstathā māmapi /
GK16andhvc2u:3091: kāntāpādatalāhītastava mude tadvanmamāpyāvayoḥ sarvaṃ tulyamaśoka kevalamahaṃ dhātrā saśokaḥ kṛtaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3097: tatra ca prabodhako vibhāvastadīyaṣallavarāga iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3104: priyāyā guṇairanurakto 'hamudbuddhānurāga iti tantrādinā arthaṃ iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3115: yatastvāṃ smadhanurmuktāḥ kāmacāpānnirgatāḥ śilīmukhāḥ bhramarā āyānti,
GK16andhvc2u:3116: tato māmapi tathā smaradhanurmuktāḥ kāmacāpānnirgatāḥ śilīmukhāḥ śarā āyānti /
GK16andhvc2u:3118: yadyapyatra kāntāpādatalenāhatiḥ tava mude puṣpavikāsāya bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:3119: tadvattathā kāntāpādatalāhatiḥ ratabandhaviśeṣaḥ mama mude santoṣāya bhavatīti yatāśrutārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3120: tatāpi svakāntāpādatalāhananenāśokasya puṣpavikāse sati nāyakasya santīṣo bhavatīti yatastava mude tato mamāpi mude iti hetutvena vyākhyeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3121: atra hi prabandhapravṛtto 'pi śloṣo vyatirekavivakṣayā tyajyamāno rasaviśeṣaṃ puṣṇāti /
GK16andhvc2u:3125: yatra hi śleṣaviṣaya eva śabde prākarāntareṇa vyatirekapratītirjāyate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3129: saśokaśabdena vyatirekamānayatā śokasahabhūtānāṃ nirvedacintādīnāṃ vyabhicāriṇāṃ vipralambhaparipoṣakāṇāmavakāśo dattaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3132: tatra kiṃ tyaktaṃ kiṃ vā gṛhītamiti parasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3136: saḥ hariḥ, yadi vā saha haribhiḥ sahaririti /
GK16andhvc2u:3146: prakṛtarasānuguṇālaṅkārāntaravivakṣayā gṛhītapūrvasyālaṅkārasya tyāgaḥ prakṛtarasāṅgaṃ bhavatīti prakṛte vyatirekasya vipralambhapoṣakatvaṃ vivṛṇoti---saśokaśabdenetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3161: alaṅkāradvayasya yā pratibhā pratītistasyā ullāsaḥ udaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3171: aśvavācino hariśabdasya sahaśabdena samāsa ityāśayena dvitīyaṃ sahariśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3178: antyapāde atra hyanya eva śabdaḥ śleṣasya viṣayo 'nyaśca vyatirekasya /
GK16andhvc2u:3179: yadi caivaṃvidhe viṣaye 'laṅkārāntaratvakalpanā kriyate tatsaṃsṛṣṭerviṣayāpahāra eva syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3180: śleṣamukhainaivātra vyatirekasyātmalābha iti nāyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭerviṣaya iti cet--na;
GK16andhvc2u:3184: yathā--- no kalpāpāyavāyoradayarayadalatkṣyādhārasyāpi śamyā locanam atra hīti /
GK16andhvc2u:3190: evaṃvidhe vākyalakṣaṇe viṣaye viṣaya ityekatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3194: upamā ca śleṣamukhenaivāyāteti śleṣo 'tra vyatirekasyānugrāhaka iti saṅkarasyaivaiṣa viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3199: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---kiṃ sarvatropamāyāḥ svaśabdenābhidhāne vyatireko bhavatyuta gamyamānatve /
GK16andhvc2u:3224: sā prasiddhā eva vartiḥ vaḥ sukhayatviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3225: anyarūpetyanena darśitaṃ dīptervaidharmyaṃ no katpetyādinā kathyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3227: vāyoriti kartari ṣaṣṭī gāḍhamudgīrṇā gāḍhodgīrṇojjvalaśrīrahani na rahitā no tamaḥkajjalena /
GK16andhvc2u:3228: prāptotpattiḥ pataṅgānna punarupagatā moṣamuṣṇātviṣo vo vartiḥ saivānyarūpā sukhayatu nikhiladvīpadīpasya dīptiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3229: atra hi sāmyaprapañjapratipādanaṃ vinaiva vyatareko darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3230: nātra locanam tama eva kajjalaṃ tena /
GK16andhvc2u:3231: na no rahitāṃ api tu rahitaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:3237: sāmyasyopamāyāḥ prapañcena prabandhena yatpratipādanaṃ svaśbadena tena vināpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3238: etaduktaṃ bhavati---pratīyamānaivopamā vyatirekasyānugrāhiṇī bhavantī nābhidhānaṃ svakaṇṭhenāpekṣate /
GK16andhvc2u:3242: tadaprāvaṇye svayaṃ cārutvahetutvābhāvāditi śleṣopamātra pṛthagalaṅkārabhāvameva na bhajate /
GK16andhvc2u:3244: etadasiddhaṃ svasaṃvedanabādhitatvāditi hṛdaye gṛhītvā svasaṃvedanamapahnuvānaṃ bālapriyā āvirbhāvitā ujvalā śrīryayā sā /
GK16andhvc2u:3271: kintu vyatirekema sahānugrahyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ bhajate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3274: vṛttau--'atra śleṣasya vyatirekāṅgatvenaiva vivakṣitatvāt śleṣamātraccārutvapratītirnāsti iti na svato 'laṅkāratā ityapi na vācyam' ityanvayaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3283: śleṣamātrāccārutvapratītirastīti śleṣasya vyatirekāṅgatvenaiva vivakṣitatvāt na svato 'laṅkāratetyapi na vācyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3284: yata evaṃvide viṣaye sāmyamātrādapi supratipāditāccārutvaṃ dṛśyata eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3286: antarme dayitāmukhaṃ tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samaivāvayo- statkiṃ māmaniśaṃ sakhe jaladhara tvaṃ dagdhamevodyataḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3288: locanam paraṃ śleṣaṃ vinopamāmātrema cārutvasampannamudāharaṇāntaraṃ darśayanniruttarīkaroti--yata ityādinā /
GK16andhvc2u:3299: 'ākrandā' ityādisthale śleṣaṃ vinā upamāgarbhavyatirekeṇaiva cārutvasya darśanā'draktastva'mityādāvapi
GK16andhvc2u:3300: śleṣasya vyatirekānugrāhakatvaṃ vinā pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ bhavatyeveti parihāragranthābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3303: me ākrandāḥ tava stanitaitaistulyā ityādi sambandhanīyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3330: yathā--- kopātkomalalobāhulatikāpāśena baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ nītvā vāsaniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3331: bhūyo naivamiti skhalatkalagirā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ dhanyo hanyata eva ninhutiparaḥ preyānrudatyā hasan //
GK16andhvc2u:3332: atra he rūpakamākṣiptamanirvyūḍhaṃ ca paraṃ rasapuṣṭaye /
GK16andhvc2u:3333: nirvoḍhumiṣṭamapi yaṃ yatnādaṅgatvena pratyavekṣate yathā--- śyāmāsvaṅgaṃ cakitahariṇīprekṣaṇe
GK16andhvc2u:3334: dṛṣṭipātaṃ locanam evaṃ grahaṇatyāgau samarthya 'nātinirvahaṇaiṣitā' iti bhāgaṃ vyācaṣṭe--raseti /
GK16andhvc2u:3337: dayitā vyādhavadhūḥ vāsagṛhaṃ kārāgārapañjarādīti paramanaucityaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3339: bhavatyo 'navarataṃ bruvate nāyamevaṃ karotīti tatpaśyantvidānīmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3340: skhalantī kopāveśena kalā madhurā ca gīryasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc2u:3342: evamiti yaduktaṃ tatkimityāha--duśceṣṭitaṃ nakhapadāda saṃsūcya aṅgulyādinirdeśena /
GK16andhvc2u:3345: yato 'sau hasanaṃ nimittīkṛtya nihnutiparaḥ priyatamaśca tadīyaṃ vyalīlaṃ kā soḍhuṃ samartheti /
GK16andhvc2u:3350: dayitādīnāṃ vyādhavadhūtvādirūpaṇasya kathanena bāhulatikāyāḥ pāśatvarūpaṇaṃ kavirnirvāhayedyadītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3366: śyāmānāṃ viśiṣyoktau bījabhūtamaṅgasāthadharmyaṃ gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān /
GK16andhvc2u:3367: atpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kvacidapi na te bhīru sādṛśyamasti //
GK16andhvc2u:3371: lakṣyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ mahākaviprabandheṣvapi dṛśyate bahuśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3372: tattu sūktitasahasradyotitātmānāṃ mahātmanāṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇamātmana eva dūṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti na vibhajya darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3373: kiṃ tu rūpakāderalaṅkāravargasya yeyaṃ vyañjakatve rasādiviṣaye lakṣaṇadigdarśitā
GK16andhvc2u:3375: locanam pāṇḍamnā tanimnā kaṇṭakitatvena ca yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3380: ekasthasādṛśyābhāve ha dolāyamāno 'haṃ sarvatra sthito na kutracidekasya dhṛtiṃ labha iti bhāva /
GK16andhvc2u:3382: yo hi kātarahṛdayo bhavatināsau sarvasvamekasthaṃ dhārayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3390: yathā mamaiva--śītāṃśoramṛtacchaṭā yada karāḥ kasmānmano me mṛśaṃ bālapriyā gamyaṃ darśayati---pāṇḍimnetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3416: me manaḥ dhvanerātmānamupanibadhnāti sukaviḥ samāhitacetāstādā tasyātmalābho bhavati mahīyāniti /
GK16andhvc2u:3422: kiṃ prāṇānna harantyuta priyatamāsañjalpamantrākṣarai- rakṣyante kimu mohamemi hahahā no vejhi keyaṃ gatiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3424: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācyadhvaneḥ prathamaṃ bhedamalakṣyakramaṃ vicāryaṃ dvitīyaṃ bhedaṃ vibhaktumāha---krameṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3430: kālakūṭānāṃ paṭalyā samūhena yaḥ saṃvāsaḥ dvayorekotpannatvātsahavāsaḥ saṃsargaṃ iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:3432: tarhi te kiṃ kutaḥ prāṇānna haranti?
GK16andhvc2u:3436: priyatamāyāḥ sañjalpeṣu yāni mantrākṣarāṇi viṣāpahārīṇi taiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3450: kā no vejhi na jānāmītyanena punarupādānaṃ ca pratyāyyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3457: asya vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvaneḥ saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyatvādanuraṇana- prakhyo ya ātmā so 'pi śūbdaśaktimūlo 'rthaśaktimūlaśceti dviprakāraḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3458: nanu śabdaśaktyā yatrārthāntaraṃ prakāśate sa yadi dhvaneḥ prakāra ucyate tadidānīṃ śleṣasya viṣaya evāpahṛtaḥ syāt,
GK16andhvc2u:3461: yasminn anuktaḥ śabdena śabda-śakty-udbhavo hi saḥ // DhvK_2.21 //
GK16andhvc2u:3464: yasmādalaṅkāro na vastumātraṃ yasmin kāvye śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa śabdaśaktyudabhavo dhvaniratyasmākaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3466: yathā--- yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścedvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3480: balino dānavānyo jayati tādṛgyena kāyo vapuḥ purāmṛtaharaṇakāle strītvaṃ prāpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3484: yaścāgaṃ govardhanaparvataṃ gāṃ ca bhūmiṃ pātālagatāmadhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3485: yasya ca nāma stutyamṛṣaya āhuḥ kiṃ tat?
GK16andhvc2u:3487: tasya śiroharo bālapriyā anusvānapadārthaṃvivṛṇvaṃstadbhānasya kramikatvaṃ darśayanti---ghaṇṭāyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3488: vivakṣitānyaparavācya ityasya sthāne 'avivakṣitavācya' iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3498: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3501: tadayamarthaḥ--yatra śabdaśaktyā sākṣādalaṅkārāntaraṃ vācyaṃ satpratibhāsate sa sarvaḥ śleṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3502: yatra tu śabdaśaktyā sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ vācyavyatiriktaṃ vyaṅgyamevālaṅkārāntaraṃ prakāśate sa dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3503: śabdaśaktyā sākṣādalaṅkārāntarapratibhā yathā--- tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargādeva hāriṇau /
GK16andhvc2u:3505: atra śṛṅgāravyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣādvirodhālaṅkāraśca pratibhāsata iti virodhacchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3508: sa tvāṃ mādhavo viṣṇuḥ sarvadaḥ pāyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3509: kīdṛk? andhakanāmnāṃ janānāṃ yena kṣayo nivāso dvārakāyāṃ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3510: yadi vā mausale iṣīkābhisteṣāṃ kṣayovināśo yena kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3511: dvitīyo 'rthaḥ--yena dhvastakāmena satā balijito vidhṇoḥ sambandhī kāyaḥ purā tripuranirdahanāvasare 'strīkṛtaḥ śaratvaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3512: udvṛttā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya,
GK16andhvc2u:3514: yasya ca ṝṣayaḥ śaśimaccandrayuktaṃ śira āhuḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3515: hara iti ca yasya nāma stutyamāhuḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3516: sa bhagavānsvayamevāndhakāsurasya vināśakārī tvāṃ sarvadā kalvakālamumāyā dhavo vallabhaḥ pāyādati /
GK16andhvc2u:3517: atra vastumātraṃ dvitīyaṃ pratītaṃ nālaṅkāra iti śleṣasyaiva viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3522: mādhavasyomādhavasya ca stotavyatvena prakṛtatvāttayoḥ sāmyaṃ na vivakṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3532: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya tu dhvanervācyena śleṣeṇa virodhena vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3533: yathā mamaiva-- ślādhyāśeṣatanuṃ sudarśanakaraḥ sarvāṅgalīlājata- trailokyāṃ caramāravindalalitenākrāntaloko hariḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3534: bibhrāmāṃ mukhabhindurūpamakhilaṃ candrātmacakṣurdadha- tsthāne yāṃ svatanorapaśyadadhikāṃ sā rukmiṇī vo 'vatāt //
GK16andhvc2u:3536: yathā ca--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc2u:3537: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahyaṃ kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc2u:3541: apiśabdābhāve tu na tata evārthadvayasyābhidhā syāt,
GK16andhvc2u:3544: yathā vismayaḥ śabdena pratibhāti vismaya ityanena śabdena tathā virodho 'pi pratibhātyapītyanena śabdena /
GK16andhvc2u:3572: ekatarasya tyāge grahaṇe vā yannimittaṃ tadabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3573: vācyatayaivetyasya vyatireka ityanenāpi sambandho vivakṣita ityāha---svatanoradhikāmitīti yathā vā---
GK16andhvc2u:3578: iti chāyā ) atra rūpakacchāyānugrāhī śleṣo vācyatayaivāvabhāsate /
GK16andhvc2u:3579: sa cākṣipte 'laṅkāro yatra punaḥ śabdāntareṇābhihitasvarūpasta na locanam bhujagaśabdārthaparyālocanābalādeva viṣaśabdo jalamabhidhāyāpi na
GK16andhvc2u:3583: nirāśīkṛtatvena khaṇḍitāni yāni mānasāni śatruhṛdayāni tānyeva kāñcanapaṅkajāni /
GK16andhvc2u:3588: evamākṣiptaśabdasya vyavacchedyaṃ pradarśyaivakārasya vyavacchedyaṃ darśayitumāha--sa ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:3601: prasṛtaḥ dikṣu vyāptaḥ pratāpasāro yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3602: evaṃbhūtāḥ yasya bāhuparidhāḥ gajendrā eveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3614: ubhayorarthayoḥ pratipādane abhidhāne śaktaḥ samartho yaḥ śabdaḥ tasya prayoge sati /
GK16andhvc2u:3624: yatrāpyabhidhāyā ekatra niyamahetuḥ prakaraṇādirvidyate tena dvitīyasminnarthe nābhidhā saṅkrāmati,
GK16andhvc2u:3626: tatrāpi yadi punastādṛkchabdo vidyate yenāsau niyāmakaḥ prakaraṇādiraphataśaktikaḥ sampādyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3627: ata eva sābhidhāśaktirbādhitāpi satī pratiprasūteva tatrāpi na dhvanerviṣaya iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3640: tamyā vinā ityādau camahia ityanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3651: sābhidhāśaktiḥ dvitīyārthābhidhānaśaktiḥ bādhitāpi bodhānanukūlākṛtāpi pratiprasūtā punarbodhānukūlā kṛtā /
GK16andhvc2u:3663: nanu śleṣasya śabdāntareṇa saleśādipadenābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati ityata āha--abhidhāyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3672: dṛṣṭyā keśava goparāgahṛtayā kiñcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenaiva skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
GK16andhvc2u:3673: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādgoṣṭhe harirvaściram //
GK16andhvc2u:3675: godhūlihṛtayā dṛṣṭyā na kiñciddṛṣṭaṃ mayā tena kāraṇena skhalitāsmimārge /
GK16andhvc2u:3676: tāṃ patitāṃ satīṃ māṃ kiṃ nāma kaḥ khalu heturyannalambase hastena /
GK16andhvc2u:3685: keśavagena uparāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyeti vā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3689: yataḥ sarvāsāmabalānāṃ madanavidhuramanasāmīrṣyākāluṣyanirāsena sevyamānaḥ san gatiḥ jīvitarakṣopāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3713: dhavalānyaṭṭāni yena sa cāsau hāsaśca dhavalāṭṭahāsaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3714: phullāḥ vikasitāḥ mallikāḥ phullamallikāḥ phullamallikānāṃ dhavalāṭṭahāso yatra sa iti vyadhikaraṇo bahuvrīhiriti vyācṣṭe---dhavalānītyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3715: evañjātīyakaḥ sarva eva bhavatu kāmaṃ vācyaśleṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3716: yatra tu sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ sadalaṅkārāntaraṃ śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa sarva eva dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3722: dhavalāni hṛdyānyaṭṭānyāpaṇā yena tādṛk phullamallikānāṃ hāso vikāsaḥ sitimā yatra /
GK16andhvc2u:3723: phullamallikā eva dhavalāṭṭahāso 'syeti tu vyākhyāne 'jaladabhujagajaṃ' ityetattulyametatsyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3726: ata eva 'avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasī' iti nyāyamapākurvanto mahākālaprabhṛtayaḥ śabdā etamevārthamabhidhāya kṛta kṛtyā eva
GK16andhvc2u:3728: atra kecinmanyante---'yeti etoṣāṃ śabdānāṃ pūrvamarthāntare 'bhidhāntaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatastathāvidhe 'rthāntare bālapriyā hāsa ityasya vyakhyānaṃ--vikāsa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3740: ṛtuvarṇanarūpaḥ ṛtuvarṇanasya vā yaḥ prastāvaḥ tena niyantritāḥ tattadartheṣu niyamitāḥ abhidhāśaktayo yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3747: kṛtādiyugasamayamupasaṃharan mallikādhavalamaṭṭahāsaṃ kurvan bhayaṅkaro mahākālaḥ mahān jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣa ityādyarthabodha ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3751: locanam dṛṣṭatadabhidhāśaktereva pratipatturniyantritābhidhāśaktikebhya etebhyaḥ pratipattirdhvananavyāpārādeveti śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ cetyaviruddham' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3752: anye tu---'sābhidhaiva dvitīyā arthasāmarthyaṃ grīṣmasya bhīṣaṇadevatāviśeṣasādṛśyātmakaṃ sahakāritvena yato 'valamvate tato dhvananavyāpārarūpocyate' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3754: arthaśleṣe 'pi śaktibhedācchabdabheda iti darśane dvitīyaḥ śabdastatrānīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3755: sa ca kadācitabhidhāvyāpārāt yathobhayoruttaradānāya 'śvato dhāvati' iti;
GK16andhvc2u:3757: yatra tu dhvananavyāpārādeva bālapriyā arthāntare jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣādyarthe /
GK16andhvc2u:3817: tatra śabdāntarabalādapi tadarthāntaraṃ pratintaraṃ pratipannaṃ pratiyamānamūlatvātpratiyamāmeva yuktam' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3820: tadanantaraṃ tu tasya dvitīyārthasya pratipannasya prathamārthena prakāraṇikena sākaṃ yā rūpaṇā sā tāvadbhātyeva,
GK16andhvc2u:3828: bālapriyā yathā---“kāhamasmi guhā vakti praśne 'muṣmin kimuttaram /
GK16andhvc2u:3843: pratīyamānaḥ dhvananādgamyamānaḥ śabdaḥ mūlaṃ yasya tatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3873: anyathā dvatīyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena vastudhvanivyavahāro 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3881: tatra hi dvitīyārtha eva prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3882: prathamārthastu yathā vā--- dattānandāḥ prajānāṃ samucitasamayākṛṣṭasṛṣṭeḥ payobhiḥ pūrvāhṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramatyahni saṃhārabhājaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:3886: 'yaṃ śleṣo na śabdopārūḍha iti vibhinna eva śleṣādanusvānīpamavyaṅgyasya dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3889: 'tasyāvināpi' ityatrāpiśabdena 'ślādhyā' ityatrādhikaśabdena 'bhramiṃ' ityādau ca rūpakeṇāsambaddhatā nirākṛteti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3906: kālāgarūṇā sa iva ca malīmasaḥ nīlaḥ payodharaḥ stanaḥ jaladharaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:3907: tasyāḥ kāminyāḥ prāvṛṣaścā kaṃ yuvānaṃ pathikañca /
GK16andhvc2u:3909: samucitasamaye pūrvamākṛṣṭāni paścātsṛṣṭāni taiḥ dīptāṃśoḥ sūryasya pāvanānāṃ paramutkṛṣṭaṃ vartamānāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3921: śīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāśca śyāmāḥ pajharāgiṇyaśca dhavaladvijaśucivadanā
GK16andhvc2u:3923: atra hi vācyo virodhastacchāyānugrāhī vā śleṣo 'yamiti na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvc2u:3925: yatra hi sākṣācchabdāvedito virodhālaṅkārastatra hi śliṣṭoktau vācyālaṅkārasya virodhasya
GK16andhvc2u:3936: dhvalairdvijairdantaiḥ śuci nirmalaṃ vadanaṃ yāsāṃ dhavaladvijavadutkṛṣṭavipravacchuci vadanaṃ ca yāsās /
GK16andhvc2u:3939: tatra yo virodhaḥ śleṣo veti saṅkaraḥ tasya viṣayatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:3968: yathā vā mamaiva--- sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayamadhīśamīśaṃ dhiyāṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:3970: atra hi śabdaśaktimūlānusvānarūpo virodhaḥ sphuṭameva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3972: yathā mamaiva--- khaṃ ye 'tyujjvalayanti lūnatamaso ye vā nakhodbhāsino locanam tatraiva virodhe śleṣe vā vācyālaṅkāratvaṃ suvacamiti yāvat
GK16andhvc2u:3975: nanu mātaṅgetyādāvapi dharmadvaye yaścakāraḥ sa virodhadyotaka eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3976: anyathā pratadharmaṃ sarvadharmānte vā na kvacidvā cakāraḥ syāt yadi samuccayārthaḥ syādityabhiprāyeṇodāharaṇāntaramāha---yatheti /
GK16andhvc2u:3978: yo na dhīśaḥ sa kathaṃ dhiyāmīśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3979: yo hariḥ kapilaḥ sa kathaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3980: caturaḥ parākramayukto yasyātmā sa kathaṃ niṣkriyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3981: arīṇāmarayuktānāṃ yo nāśayitā sa kathaṃ cakraṃ vahumānena dhārayati /
GK16andhvc2u:3986: bālapriyā tathā ca virodhaśleṣasaṅkarasya vācyālaṅkṛtitvanirūpitaṃ viṣayatvamiti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3992: mātaṅgagāminyaśśīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāścetyādau dharmadvayavācakānte yaścakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3996: anyathā cakāro yadi samuccayārthassyāttadā pratidharmaṃ sarvadharmānte vā syāt,
GK16andhvc2u:3998: sarvadharmānta ityatra sarvaśabdānta iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4008: pratīyata ityasya dhvanyata ityartha ityāha--nocyate kenaciditi /
GK16andhvc2u:4010: ye mūrdhasvavabhāsinaḥ kṣitibhṛtāṃ ye cāmarāṇāṃ śirāṃ- syākrāmantyubhaye 'pi te dinapateḥ pādāḥ śriye santu vaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4013: arthaśaktyudbhavas tv anyo yatrārthaḥ sa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc2u:4014: yas tātparyeṇa vastv anyad vyanakty uktiṃ vinā svataḥ // DhvK_2.22 //
GK16andhvc2u:4017: locanam nakhairudbhāsante ye 'vaśyaṃ khe gagane na udbhāsanta /
GK16andhvc2u:4025: ye kiraṇāḥ lūnaṃ vināśitaṃ tamastibhiraṃ pāpañca yaiste /
GK16andhvc2u:4029: ye kiraṇāḥ, saroruhāṇāṃ pajhānāṃ śriyaṃ kāntiṃ puṣṇanti ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4032: kṣitibhṛtāṃ parvatānām mūrdhasuśṛṅgeṣu śirassu ca ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4033: amarāṇāṃ devānām śirāṃsi ākrāmanti praṇāmakāle spṛśanti teṣvanavabhāsinaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:4036: a6 lūnatamastvādidharmaiḥ kiraṇatulyānāṃ dinapateścaraṇānāṃ gaganānudbhāsitvādibhiḥ kiraṇebhyo vyatireko dhvanita iti bodhyam // 2.1 //
GK16andhvc2u:4039: ya uktiṃ vinā svatastātparyeṇa anyadvastu vyanaktī'tyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4054: yadi lajjātmakavyabhicāripratītistarhyayamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasyaiva dhvanerviṣayo na tu vastudhvaneriti śaṅkate--'na ce'tyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4057: yatrārthaḥ svasāmarthyādarthāntaramabhivyanākti śabdavyāpāraṃ vinaiva so 'rthaśakyudbhavo nāmānusvānopamavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4060: atra hi līlākamalapatrragaṇanamupasarjanīkṛtasvarūpaṃ śabdavyāpāraṃ vinaivārthāntaraṃ vyabhicāribhāvalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:4062: yato yatra sākṣācchabdaniveditebhyo vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4064: yathā kumārasambhave madhuprasaṅge vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantyā devyā āgamanādivarṇanaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:4073: vyabhicāraṇāṃ yatrālakṣyakramatayā vyavadhivandhyaiva pratipattiḥ svavibhāvādabalāttatra sākṣācchabdaniveditatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti na pūrvāparavirodhaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4074: pūrvaṃ hyuktaṃ vyabhicāriṇāmapi bhāvatvānna svaśabdataḥ pratipattirityādi vistarataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4075: etaduktaṃ bhavati--yadyapi rasabhāvādirartho dhvanyamāna eva bhavati na vācyaḥ kadācidapi,
GK16andhvc2u:4077: yatra hi vibhāvānubhāvebhyaḥ sthāyigatebhyo vyabhicārigatebhyaśca pūrṇobhyo jhaṭityeva
GK16andhvc2u:4088: ityādāvityādipadena 'āvarjitā kiñcidive'tyādeḥ iha tu sāmarthyākṣiptavyabhicārimukhena rasapratītiḥ tasmādayamanyo dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4094: saṃmohanaṃ nāma ca puṣpadhanvā dhanuṣyamoghaṃ samadhatta bāṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:4098: atra hi bhagavatyāḥ prathamameva tatpravaṇatvāttasya cedānīṃ tadunmukhībhūtatvātpraṇayipriyatayā
GK16andhvc2u:4103: iha tu pajhadalagaṇanamadhomukhatvaṃ cānyathāpi kumārīṇāṃ sambhāvyata iti jhaṭiti na lajjāyāṃ viśramayati hṛdayaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:4122: sūcito yaḥ pakṣapātaḥ gāḍhībhāvadrasātmakasthāyirūpaḥ tasya vyabhicāriṇaśca,
GK16andhvc2u:4148: yatra ca śabdavyāpārasahāyo 'rthontarasya vyañjakatvenopādīyate sa nāsya dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4153: rasastvatrāpi dūrata eva vyabhicārisvarūpe paryālocyamāne bhātīti tadapekṣayālakṣyakramataiva /
GK16andhvc2u:4164: yadyapi cātra śabdāntarasannidhāne 'pa pradoṣārthaṃ prati na kasyacidabhidhāśaktiḥ padasyeti vyañjakatvaṃ na vighaṭitaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:4177: tarhi kathamatra lakṣyakramatvamuktamityata āha--lajjeti evaśabdaḥ kevalaśabdaśceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4182: viṭaṃ saṅketakāle mano yasya taṃ tajjijñāsum /
GK16andhvc2u:4183: ata eva hasadbhyāṃ netrābhyāmarpitaṃ sūcitaṃ ākūtaṃ saṅketakālajijñāsārūpābhiprāyo yena tam /
GK16andhvc2u:4201: śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā śabdārthaśaktyā vākṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaryatra svoktyā prakāśīkriyate so 'smādanusvānopamavyaṅgyāddhvaneranya evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4202: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛganyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4204: yathā kaścidāha--'gambhīro 'haṃ na me kṛtyaṃ ko 'pi veda na sūcitam /
GK16andhvc2u:4208: prakāntaprakāradvayopasaṃhāraṃ tṛtīyaprakārasūcanaṃ caikenaiva yatnena karomītyāśayena sādhāraṇamavataraṇapadaṃ prakṣipati vṛttikṛt---tathā ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4209: tena coktaprakāradvayenāyamapi tṛtīyaḥ prakāro mantavya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4220: ataḥ me kṛtyaṃ sūcitaṃ sat ko 'pi na veda na jānāti /
GK16andhvc2u:4228: na tu vyaṅgyārthaḥ śabdāntareṇa pradarśita itītyāha--ata eveti // 2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:4235: śabdaścārthaśca śabdārthau śabdārthauca śabdārthau ca śabdārthāḥ teṣāṃ śaktetyarthātrrividho 'pi bhedassaṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4244: tatra śabdaśaktyā yathā--- vatse mā gā viṣādaṃ śvasanamurujavaṃ santyajordhvapravṛttaṃ kampaḥ ko vā guruste bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitenātra yāhi /
GK16andhvc2u:4245: pratyākhyānaṃ surāṇāmiti bhayaśamanacchajhanā kārayitvā yasmai lakṣmīmadvādvaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ payodhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4246: locanam sa vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nyo vācyamātrālaṅkārāpekṣayā dvitīyo lokottaraścālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4250: kampo 'pāmpatiḥ ko brahmā vā tava guruḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4252: jṛmbhitaṃ ca gātrasaṃmardanātmakaṃ balaṃ bhinatti āyāsakāritvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4255: sā hi kamalā puṇḍarīkākṣameva hṛdaye nidhāyotthiteti svayameva devāntarāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:4257: tatsamarthācaraṇamanyatra doṣodghāṭanena atra yāhīti cābhinayaviśeṣeṇa sakalaguṇādaradarśakena kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4266: he vatse tvaṃ viṣādaṃ duḥkhaṃ mā gāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4267: ūrdhvapravṛttamurujavaṃ śvasanaṃ dīrghaśvāsaṃ santyaja saṃvṛṇviti ca pāṭhaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4294: arthaśaktyā yathā---- ambā śete 'tra vṛddhā pariṇatavayasāmagraṇaritra tāto niḥśeṣāgārakarmaśramaśithilatanuḥ kumbhadāsī tathātra /
GK16andhvc2u:4295: asmin pāpāhamekā katipayadivasaproṣitaprāṇanāthā pānthāyetthaṃ taruṇyā kathitamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvam //
GK16andhvc2u:4297: locanam ityuktaprakāreṇa bhayanivāraṇavyājena surāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ lakṣmīṃ kārayitvā payodhiryasmai tāmadātsa vo yuṣmākaṃ duritaṃ dahatviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4299: atraikaikasya padasya vyañjaktavaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ sukalpyamiti svakaṇṭhena noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:4304: bhagavatsambandhiṣu sakalaguṇeṣu ya ādaraḥ svasya bahumatistaddarśakenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4315: niśśeṣairagārakarmabhissvayamanuṣṭhitaiḥ gṛhakarmabhiḥ yaḥ śramastena śithilā asvasthā tanuryasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc2u:4317: avasarasya tattassthale mātrādiśayanādirūpasya prastāvasya vyāhṛtiruktiḥ tasya vyājaḥ saḥ pūrvo yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc2u:4318: atrāvayoryathākāmaṃ rantuṃ śakyaṃ ko 'pi na jānīyāt,
GK16andhvc2u:4319: tvaddarśanena kāmārtā māṃ ramaṇena prīṇayeti vaktrī bodhayatīti vaktṛvaiśiṣṭyādijñānavatāṃ sahṛdayānāṃ vyajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4320: parantu vyaṅgyārtho yamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvamiti vyājaśabdena kavinā āviṣkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4322: ambā tāta ityābhyāṃ pitrornaisargikavātsalyaśālitvena tau mama sarvatrāpyanukūlāveveti /
GK16andhvc2u:4330: katipayetyādinā patyuracirātpratyāgamanamanāśaṅkyamiti prāṇanāthaityanena pativiṣayakānurāgābhāva iti ca dyotyata ityūhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4335: artho 'pi dvividho jñeyo vastuno 'nyasya dīpakaḥ // DhvK_2.24 //
GK16andhvc2u:4338: arthaśaktyudbhavānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye dhvanau yo vyañjako 'rtha uktastasyāpi dvau prakārau---kaveḥ kavinibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ prauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīra
GK16andhvc2u:4343: evamarthaśaktyudbhavasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam. śleṣādyalaṅkarebhyaścāsya vibhakto viṣaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4345: yo 'rthāntarasya dīpako vyañjako 'rtha uktaḥ so 'pi dvividhaḥ /
