GK16andhvc2u:4347: yāvattadbhedo yo dvitīyaḥ so 'pa vyañjakārthadvaividhyadvāreṇa dvividha ityapiśabdasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4350: prakarṣema ūḍaḥ sampādayitavyena vastunā prāptastatkuśalaḥ prauḍhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4369: sajjehi surahimāso ṇa dāva appei juaijaṇalakkhamuhe /
GK16andhvc2u:4372: locanam sajjayati surabhimāso na tāvadarpayati yuvatijanalakṣyamukhān /
GK16andhvc2u:4374: atra vasantaścetano 'naṅgasya sakhā sajjayati kevalaṃ na tāvadarpayatītyevaṃvidhayā
GK16andhvc2u:4375: samarpayitavyavastvarpaṇakuśalayoktyā sahakārodbhedinī vasantadaśā yata uktā ato
GK16andhvc2u:4377: anyathā vasante sapallavasahakārodgama iti vastumātraṃ na vyañjakaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4380: atra lohitaṃ bimbaphalaṃ śuko daśatīti na vyañjakatā kācit /
GK16andhvc2u:4381: yadā tu kavinibaddhasya sābhilāṣasya taruṇasya vakturitthaṃ prauḍhoktistadā vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:4383: vṛttau---'svatassambhavī ca dvitīya' iti pāṭhaḥ kvācitkaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4385: surabhimāsaḥ vasantasambandhī māsaḥ yuvatijanā eva lakṣyāṇi yeṣāṃ tathāvidhāni mukhānyagrāṇi yeṣāṃ tān /
GK16andhvc2u:4386: lakṣasahāniti pāṭhe tāni sahante teṣveva prayojyā iti yāvattānityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4388: navāni pallavāśca patrāṇi ca tāni lānti ādadate iti tān /
GK16andhvc2u:4403: na tāvadarpayatītyanena bhaviṣyadarpaṇavyañjanadvārā manmathonmāthanasya bhavī gāḍhagāḍhī bhāvasca dyotyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4412: śukta ityasya sthāne ayaṃ śukapotaka iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4419: abbhuṭṭhāṇaṃ via mammahasya diṇṇaṃ tuha thaṇohim //
GK16andhvc2u:4420: svataḥ sambhavī ya aucatyena bahirapi sambhāvyamānasadbhāvo na kevalaṃ bhaṇitivaśenaivābhiniṣpannaśariraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4427: stanau tāvadiha pradhānabhūtau tato 'pi gauravitaḥ kāmastābhyāmabhyutthānenoparcyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4428: yauvanaṃ cānayoḥ paricārakabhāvena sthitamityevaṃvidhenoktivaicitryeṇa tvadīyastanāvaloka napravṛddhamanmathāvasthaḥ ko na bhavatīti bhaṅgyā svābhiprāyadhvananaṃ kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4429: tava tāruṇyenonnatau stanāviti hi vacanena vyañjakatā /
GK16andhvc2u:4441: sādaraṃ vitīrṇo yauvanena datte yauvanahastālambo yatra tadyathā tathā /
GK16andhvc2u:4445: iti vacane sati tatpratipādyasya vyañjakatā na hītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4447: svataḥsambhavītyanena loke sambhāvyamāno 'pītyartho vivakṣita ityāśayena vṛttau 'ya' ityādinā vivṛtaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:4467: locanam racitāni vividhabhaṅgībhiḥ prasādhanānīta tāsāṃ sambhogavyagrimābhāvāttadviracanaśilpakauśalameva paramiti daurbhāgyātiśaya idānīmiti prakāśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:4468: garvaśca bālyāvivekādināpi bhavatīti nātra svoktisadbhāvaḥ śaṅkyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4469: eṣa cārtho yathā yathā varṇyate āstāṃ vā varṇnā,
GK16andhvc2u:4470: bahirapi yadi pratyakṣādināvalokyate tathā tathā saubhāgyātiśayaṃ vyādhavadhvā dyotayati // 2.4 //
GK16andhvc2u:4471: evamarthaśaktyudbhavo dvibhedo vastumātrasya vyañjanīyatve vastudhvanirūpatayā nirūpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4473: na kevalaṃ śabdaśakteralaṅkāraḥ pratīyate pūrvoktanītyā yāvadarthaśakterapi /
GK16andhvc2u:4474: yadi vā na kevalaṃ yatra vastumātraṃ pratīyate yāvalaṅkāro 'pītyapiśabdārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4495: nanu vyaṅgyo jāyāyāḥ saubhāgyātiśayo hi garvaheturityatasso 'rtho garviṇītyanenāviṣkṛta ityata āha---garvaśceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4498: svataḥsasbhavī ya aucityena bahirapi sambhāvyamānetyādyuktaṃ yojayati---eṣa cārtha ityādi //24//
GK16andhvc2u:4503: yatrāpītyapiśabdasya arthaśakterapīti alaṅkāro 'pīti yojanāṃ vikalpena darśayannāha---na kevalamityādi // 2.5 //
GK16andhvc2u:4508: sa sarvo gamyamānatvaṃ bibhrad bhūmnā pradarśitaḥ // DhvK_2.26 //
GK16andhvc2u:4511: anyatra vācyatvena prasiddho yo rūpakādiralaṅkāraḥ so 'nyatra pratīyamānatayā bāhulyena pradarśitastatrabhavadbhirbhaṭṭodbhaṭādibhiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4512: tathā ca sasandehādiṣūpamārūpakātiśayoktīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ pradarśitāmityalaṅkārāntarasyālaṅkārāntare vyaṅgyatvaṃ na yatnapratipādyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4514: sarva iti pradarśita iti ca padenāsambhāvanātra mithyaivetyāha /
GK16andhvc2u:4515: upamānena tattvaṃ ca bhedaṃ ca vadataḥ punaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4518: tasyāḥ pāṇirayaṃ nu mārutacalatpatrrāṅguliḥ pallavaḥ ityādāvṛpamā rūpakaṃ vā dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4521: yatrālaṅkāro 'pyalaṅkārāntaraṃ dhvanati tatra vastumātreṇālaṅkāro dhvanyata iti kiyadidamasambhāvyamiti tātparyoṇālaṅkārāntaraśabdo vṛttikṛtā prayukto na tu prakṛtopayogī;
GK16andhvc2u:4523: arthaśaktyudbhave dhvanau vastvivālaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgya ityetāvataḥ prakṛtatvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4524: tathā copasaṃhāragranthe bālapriyā tathā ca sasandehādiṣvityādivṛttigrandhaṃ vivṛṇoti---upamānenetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4533: ślokasyāsya sampūrṇasyānavagamādyathābhātaṃ vyākhyāyate---ayaṃ tasyāḥ pāṇiḥ pallavaḥ nu itati yojanā /
GK16andhvc2u:4551: tat-paratvaṃ na vācyasya nāsau mārgo dhvaner mataḥ // DhvK_2.27 //
GK16andhvc2u:4553: tatparatvaṃ na vācyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ // 27 //
GK16andhvc2u:4554: alaṅkārāntareṣu tvanuraṇanarūpālaṅkārapratītau satyāmapi yatra vācyasya vyaṅgyapratipādanaunmukhyena cārutvaṃ na prakāśate nāsau dhvanermārgaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4555: tathā ca dīpakādāvalaṅkāre upamāyā gamyamānatve 'pi tatparatvena cārutvasyāvyavasthānānna dhvanivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4557: candamaūehi ṇisā ṇalini kamalehi kusumagucchehi laā /
GK16andhvc2u:4558: locanam 'te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gatāḥ' ityatra śleke vṛttikṛt
GK16andhvc2u:4559: 'dhvanyaṅgatā cobhobhyāṃ prākarābhyāṃ' ityupakramya 'tatreha prakāraṇādvyaṅgyatvenetyavagantavyam' iti vakṣyati /
GK16andhvc2u:4565: nanu pūrvaireva yadīdamuktaṃ kimarthaṃ tava yatna ityāśaṅkyāha---iyaditi /
GK16andhvc2u:4569: candramayūkhādīnāṃ na niśādinā vinā ko 'pi parabhāgalābhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4570: sajjanānāmapi kāvyakathāṃ vinā kīdṛśī bālapriyā prakṛtamityātrāha---arthetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4574: alaṅkārāntareṇa alaṅkārāntarasya vyahkyatvamityasya ekālahkāranimittakamanyalaṅkārasya vyaṅgyatvamityarthamabhisandhāya bhāvārthe vivṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4587: atra gurvīkriyata ityasya candramayūkhairniśetyādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4588: atra niśayā candramayūkhāḥ guravaḥ kriyante ityādivipariṇāmena padānāṃ sambandhādarthasāmarthyādvā pratīyamānamarthāntaraṃ darśayati---candretyādi
GK16andhvc2u:4590: haṃsehi sarasohā kavvakahā sajjanehi karai garuri //
GK16andhvc2u:4593: iti chāyā) ityādiṣūpamāgarbhatve 'pi sati vācyālaṅkāramukhenaiva cārutvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate na vyaṅgyālaṅkāratātparyeṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:4595: yatra tu vyaṅgyaparatvenaiva vācyasya vyavasthānaṃ tatra vyaṅgyamukhenaiva vyapadeśo yuktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4601: tatsarvaṃ kāvyakathāyāḥ sajjanairityetāvānayamartho guruḥ kryita iti dīpakabalāccakāsti /
GK16andhvc2u:4602: kathāśabda idamāha---āsatāṃ tāvatkāvyasya kecana sūkṣmā viśeṣāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4604: teṣu tu satsvāste subhagaṃ kāvyaśabdavyapadeśabhāgapi śabdasandarbhamātram;
GK16andhvc2u:4605: tathā taiḥ kriyate yathādaraṇīyatāṃ pratipadyata iti dīpakasyaiva vyavacchedyabalena yo 'rtho 'bhimato yatra tatparatvaṃ sa dhvanemārga ityevaṃrūpastaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yatra tviti /
GK16andhvc2u:4607: yadi vā vācyālaṅkārasya sadbhāvamātraṃ na vyañjakatā,
GK16andhvc2u:4629: sajjaneṣu haṃsādīnāṃ kāvyakathāyāṃ niśādīnāṃ ca gamyamānāyā upamāyā na prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4633: yatretyādinā pradarśitasya vikalpena traividhyaṃ bhavatīti darśayati---tatra cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4635: yathā--- prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyā- nnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi /
GK16andhvc2u:4636: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kimiti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyāta- stvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4637: yathā vā mamaiva--- lāvaṇyakāntiparipūritadiṅmukhe 'smi- nsmere 'dhunā tava mukhe taralāyatākṣi /
GK16andhvc2u:4638: kṣobhaṃ yadeti na manāgapi tena manye suvyaktameva jalarāśirayaṃ payodhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4642: kasmiṃścidanantabalasamudāyavati narapatau samudraparisaravartini pūrṇacandrodayatadīyabalāvagāhanādinā nimittena payodhestāvatkampo jātaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4643: so 'nena sandehenotprekṣyata iti sasandehotprekṣayoḥ saṅkarātsaṅkarālaṅkāro vācyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4644: tena ca vāsudevarūpatā bālapriyā eṣāmudāharaṇāni sphuṭībhaviṣyanti /
GK16andhvc2u:4646: eṣaḥ rājā, prāptā śrīḥ sampadramā ca yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4648: manthakhedaṃ mathanahetukaṃ duḥkham kasmāt kimiti vidadhyāt kuryāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4653: asya rājñaḥ pūrvā nidrāmapyahaṃ naiva sambhāvayāmi naiva saṃśaye /
GK16andhvc2u:4657: ataḥ kimiti mayi bhūyaḥ setuṃ badhnāti /
GK16andhvc2u:4658: tvayi āyāte svasannidhimāgate sati iti vitarkān pūrvoktavākyairgamyān kiṃ mathnīyādityādisandehān /
GK16andhvc2u:4659: dadhata iva taddhāraṇādiva payodheḥ kampaḥ jalacāñcalyamatha ca vepathuḥ ābhātītyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4665: vitarkān dadhata iti vākyapratipāditena eṣaḥ kiṃ mathnīyāditi sandehena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4667: kampena kāryeṇa nimittena uktasandeharūpo hetuḥ payodhāvutprekṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4674: vīrāṇaṃ ramai ghusiṇaruṇammi ṇa tadā piāthaṇucchaṅge /
GK16andhvc2u:4680: adyatanatve bhagavato 'pi prāptaśrīkatvenānālasyena sakaladvīpādhipati vijayitvena ca vartamānatvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4683: yo yo 'samprāptalakṣmīko nirvyājavijigīṣākrāntaḥ sa sa māṃ mathnīyādityādyarthasambhāvanāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4684: na ca punarapīti pūrvāmiti bhūya iti ca śabdairayamākṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4686: yathā pṛthvī pūrvaṃ kārtavīryeṇa jitā punarapi jāmadagnyeneti /
GK16andhvc2u:4687: pūrvā nidrā ca siddhā rājaputrādyavasthāyāmapīti siddhaṃ rūpakadhvanirevāyamiti /
GK16andhvc2u:4697: pūrvaṃ mathanodyukto nidronmukhaḥ setubandhanodyuktaśca yo vāsudevaḥ tatsvarūpādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4702: tathācaitadvacanakālīnatathāvidhavāsudevādvyatireko na bhātīti tadabhedo 'tra dhvanyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4703: nanvatra niśi vāsudevatvapratīti vinā payodheruktavitarkā na dhaṭanta ityastadvyaṅgyaṃ tadupapādakatayā guṇībhūtamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharati---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4709: vāsudeva iva asamprāptalakṣmīko yo yo janaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4720: kvacit granthe prāptaśrīrityasyānantaraṃ yathā vā 'jyotsnāpūre'tyādi pāṭho dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc2u:4721: sa locanam yathā ca---- jyotsnāpūraprasaradhavale saikate 'sminsarayvā vādadyūtaṃ suciramabhavatsiddhayūnoḥ kayościt /
GK16andhvc2u:4722: eko 'vādītprathamanihataṃ keśinaṃ kaṃsamanyo matvā tattavaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam //
GK16andhvc2u:4727: kāntiḥ prabhā tābhyāṃ paripūritāni saṃvibhaktani hṛdyāni sampāditāni diṅmukhāni yena /
GK16andhvc2u:4729: smereriṣadvihasanaśīle taralāyate prasādāndolanavikāsasundare akṣiṇī yasyāstasyā āmantraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:4732: kopakaṣāyapāṭalaṃ smeraṃ ca tava mukhaṃ sandhyāruṇapūrṇaśaśadharamaṇḍalameveti bhāvyaṃ kṣobheṇa calacittatayā sahṛdayasya /
GK16andhvc2u:4734: jalādayaḥ śabdā bhāvārthapradhānā bālapriyā tvapapāṭha ityāha---yathocetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4737: bhavacchabdārthasya varṇyasya rājño hananakartṛtvoktyā tasya vāsudevābhedo yataḥ sphujīkṛtastasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4744: yeṣu mukhasya svadṛṣṭidvārā sambandhastāni diṅmukhānīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4749: adhunetyasya na eti ityanenāpi sambandha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4765: kṣobhapadasya cittacāñcalyamātrārthakatve tu mukhasya saundaryātiśaya eva dhvanenna candrābhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4772: atra ca kṣobho madanavikārātmā sahṛdayasya tvanmukhāvalokanena bhavatītīyatyabhidhāyā viśrāntatayā rūpakaṃ dhvanyamānameva /
GK16andhvc2u:4775: anuraṇanarūpaṃ yadrūpakamarthaśaktivyaṅgyaṃ tadāśrayeṇeha kāvyasya cārutvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate /
GK16andhvc2u:4778: vīrāṇāṃ ramate ghusṛṇāruṇe na tathā priyāstanotsaṅge /
GK16andhvc2u:4780: prasādhitapriyatamāśvāsanaparatayā samanantarībhūtayuddhatvaritamanaskatayā ca dolāyamānadṛṣṭitve 'pi yuddhe tvarātiśaya iti vyatireko vācyālaṅkāraḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4781: tatra tu yeyaṃ dhvanyamānopamā priyākucakuṅmalābhyāṃ sakalajanatrāsakareṣvapi śātraveṣu mardanodyateṣu rājakumbhasthaleṣu bālapriyā iti /
GK16andhvc2u:4790: vyaṅgyasyoktasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatvaṃ nirākurvan dhvaniṃ vyavasthāpayati--atra cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4801: nanu vṛttau vīrāṇāmityudāharaṇayorupamādhvaniḥ svaśabdena kutato na yojita ityata āha--tulyetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4805: tathā ghusṛṇāruṇe priyāstanotsaṅge na samate ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4815: pratipādanāt sambhogatvarāpekṣayā yuddhe tvarātiśayo gamyata iti tasya vācyāyamānatvāt vācyalaṅkāratā /
GK16andhvc2u:4816: yadvā---iti vyatireka ityasya ityarthavyañjako vyatireka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4829: iti chāyā ) ākṣepadhvaniryathā---- sa vaktumakhilān śakto hayagrīvāśritān guṇān /
GK16andhvc2u:4831: locanam tadvaśena ratimādadānānāmiva bahumāna iti saiva vīratātiśayacamatkāraṃ vidhatta ityupamāyāḥ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4834: teṣāmasurāṇāṃ pātālavāsināṃ yaiḥ punaḥ punarindrapurāvamardanādi kiṃ kiṃ na kṛtaṃ taddhṛdayamiti yattebhyastebhyo 'tiduṣkarebhyo 'pyakampanīyavyavasāyaṃ tacca /
GK16andhvc2u:4836: teṣāṃ ratnānāmā samantāddharaṇe ekarasaṃ tatparaṃ yaddhṛdayaṃ tatkusumabāṇena sukumārataropakaraṇasambhāreṇa
GK16andhvc2u:4844: gajakumbhasthaleṣvityasya ratimityanena bahumāna ityanena ca sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4850: priyākucakuṅmalasādṛśyena gajakumbhasthaleṣu prītiṃ bibhratāṃ vīrāṇāṃ teṣu bahumatirivetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4855: pratīyamāno yo bhaṭānāṃ vīryātiśayastasya yaścamatkāraḥ camatkārakāritvaṃ tamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4868: teṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ yadityādinā pūrvārdhabhāvārthakathanaṃ taditi śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4874: devvāettammi phale kiṃ kīrai ettiaṃ puṇā bhaṇimo /
GK16andhvc2u:4877: sakalaratnasāratulyo bimbādhara iti hi teṣāṃ bahumāno vāstava eva /
GK16andhvc2u:4891: ratnāharaṇe ekarasaṃ yaddhṛdayaṃ tadbimbadhare niveśitamiti vastuto bhinnayorantaḥkaraṇavṛttiviśeṣātmakayoḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4914: padaprakāśaścāyaṃ dhvaniriti vākyasyārthāntaratātparye 'pi sati na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4917: avaraddhasya vi ṇa hu de pahujāṇaa rosiuṃ sakkam //
GK16andhvc2u:4919: aparāddhasyāpi na khalu te bahujña roṣituṃ śakyam //
GK16andhvc2u:4920: iti chāyā) locanam daivāyatte phale kiṃ kriyatāmetāvatpunarbhaṇāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4923: kiṃ kriyatāṃ pallavāstvatīva hṛdyā itīyatābhidhā samāptaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:4924: atra phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātsamarthakamasya vastunaḥ pūrvameva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4925: lokottarajigīṣātadupāyapravṛttasyāpi hi phalaṃ sampallakṣaṇaṃ daivāyattaṃ kadācinna bhavedapītyevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakam /
GK16andhvc2u:4926: nanvasya sarvavākyasyāprastutapraśaṃsā prādhānyena vyaṅgyā tatkathamarthāntaranyāsasya vyaṅgyatā,
GK16andhvc2u:4928: sarvo hi dhvaniprapañcaḥ padaprakāśo vākyaprakāśaśceti yakṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4935: atra ityevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ asya vastunaḥ samarthakaṃ phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātpūrvameva pratīyata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4936: daivāyatte hi phale kiṃ kriyatāmityatra phalaśabdaḥ prakaraṇavaśāt sasyarūpamarthamabhidhayā vakti,
GK16andhvc2u:4939: tataśca sarveṣāṃ sampado daivāyattāḥ kadācinna bhaveyurapīti sāmānyarūpo 'rthaḥ pūrvoktaprastutārthasya samarthako labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4940: pūrvameva pratīyate ityasya daivāyatte hi phale ityasya śravaṇakāla eva pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4943: upāyapravṛttasyāpi sampallakṣaṇaṃ phalamalabdhavataḥ kasyacidrājādeḥ guṇapraśaṃsārūpaḥ prastutārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4953: nanvevaṃ sati kathamatra vyavahāra hatyata atra hi vācyaviśeṣeṇa sāparāghasyāpi bahujñasya kopaḥ kartumaśakya iti samarthakaṃ sāmānyamanvitamanyattātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc2u:4957: hṛdaye sthāpito na tu bahiḥ prakaṭato manyuryayā /
GK16andhvc2u:4958: ata evāpradarśitaroṣamukhīmapi māṃ prasādayan he bahujña,
GK16andhvc2u:4959: aparāddhasyāpi tava na khalu roṣakaraṇaṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4961: anantaraṃ tu tadarthaparyālojanādyatsāmānyarūpaṃ samarthakaṃ pratīyate tadeva camatkārakāri /
GK16andhvc2u:4962: sā hi khaṇḍitā satī vaidagdhyānunītā taṃ pratyasūyāṃ darśayantītthamāha /
GK16andhvc2u:4963: yaḥ kaścidbahujño dhūrtaḥ sa evaṃ sāparādho 'pi svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayatīti mā tvamātmani bahumānaṃ mithyā grahīriti /
GK16andhvc2u:4972: kasyāścidantargataroṣāyā anāviṣkṛtaroṣacihnāyāḥ kṛtāgasā vallabhena prasādyamānāyāḥ taṃ prativacanam--hṛdayetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4979: ato 'parāddhamapi tvāṃ prati roṣaṃ kartuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5004: yato bahujñāstu sāparādhā api tattadvacanena svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5005: anvitamityanena sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvarūpasambandho vivakṣita iti darśayati---viśeṣa ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5010: jāejja vaṇuddese khujja vvia pāavo gaḍiavatto /
GK16andhvc2u:5011: mā māṇusammi loe tāekvaraso dariddo a //
GK16andhvc2u:5014: ita chāyā) atra hi tyāgaikarasasya daridrasya janmānabhinandanaṃ truṭitapatrrakubjapā dapajanmābhinandanaṃ ca sākṣācchabdavācyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5015: tathāvidhādapi pādapāttādṛśasya puṃsa upamānopameyatvapratītipūrvakaṃ śocyatāyāmādhikyaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:5023: jāyeya, vanoddeśa eva vanasyaikānte gahane yatra sphuṭatarabahuvṛkṣasampattyā prekṣate 'pi na kaścit /
GK16andhvc2u:5026: chāyāmapi na karoti tasya kā puṣpaphalavattetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5027: tādṛśo 'pi kadācidāṅgārikasyopayogī bhavedulūkādīnāṃ vā nivāsāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5031: yatra lokyate so 'rthibhistena cārthijano na ca kiñcicchakyate kartuṃ tanmahadvaiśasamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5033: ityasyānantaraṃ 'raktastvaṃnavapallavai'riti iti ca pāṭhaḥ kvacit dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc2u:5047: ahaṃ kubjaḥ galitapatraḥ pādapaḥ panoddeśe iva jāyeya /
GK16andhvc2u:5050: atra hi madhau malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākāritvaṃ manmathonmāthadāyitvenaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:5058: viṣavātena hi mūrchito bṛṃhita upacito mohaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:5059: ekaśca mūrcchitaḥ pathikamadhye 'nyeṣāmapi dhairyacyuti vidadhanmūrcchāṃ karotītityubhayathotprekṣā /
GK16andhvc2u:5061: tataḥ kiṃ? na hi hetutā paramārthataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5062: tathāpi tu hetutā utprekṣyata iti yatkiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc2u:5078: prakṛte niḥśvāsānilasya bhujagasambandhitayāviṣasamparko gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5080: tatra samucchrāyārthāprāyeṇā vyācaṣṭe---bṛṃhita iti asyaiva vivaraṇam---upacita iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5089: ubhayathotprekṣeti viṣavātopacitatvaṃ mohāvasthāprāptiśceti ye tayoḥ malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākaraṇehetutvenotprekṣetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5104: candanāsaktabhujagānāṃ niśvāsānilaiḥ mūrcchitaḥ sambaddha iti svarūpakathanamātraparaṃ tadviśeṣaṇamato vācyārthaniṣpattirbodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5109: isākalusassa vi tuha muhassa ṇaṃ esa puṇṇimācando /
GK16andhvc2u:5110: ajja sarisattaṇaṃ pāviūṇa aṅge via ṇa māi //
GK16andhvc2u:5112: adya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyāṅga eva na māti //
GK16andhvc2u:5117: yadi tu prasannasya mukhasya sādṛśyamudvahetsarvadā vā tatkiṃ kuryāttvanmukhaṃ tvetadbhavatīti manorathānāmapyapathamidamityapiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5118: aṅge svadehe na mātyeva daśa diśaḥ pūrayati yataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5121: nanu nanuśabdena vitarkotprekṣārūpamācakṣāṇenāsambaddhatā nirākṛteti sambhāvayamāna bālapriyā 'anuraṇanarūpā' saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5123: śaṅkate 'na ce'tyādi 'evaṃvidhe viṣaye' iti candanāsaktetyādisthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5143: atra gamyaṃ hetumāha---daśadiśaḥ pūrayati yata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5147: aṅgena bhātyevetyanena labdhaṃ svaprabhayā diśaṃ pūraṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5150: tava mukhasya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyeveti mukhasādṛśyaprāptihetukatvenotprekṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5158: anubaddhaḥ yathā vā---- trāsākulaḥ paripatan parito niketān puṃbhirna kaiścidapi dhanvibhiranvabandhi /
GK16andhvc2u:5159: tasthau tathāpi na mṛgaḥ kvacidaṅganābhi- rākarṇapūrṇanayaneṣuhatekṣaṇaśrīḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5161: śleṣadhvaniryathā--- ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5163: atra vadhūmiḥ saha valabhīrasevanteti vākyārthapratīteranantaraṃ vadhva iva locanam udāharaṇāntaramāha--yathā veti /
GK16andhvc2u:5164: paritaḥ sarvato niketān paripatannākramanna kaiścidapi cāpapāṇibhirasau mṛgo 'nubaddhastathāpi na kvacittasthau trāsacāpalayogātsvābhāvikādeva
GK16andhvc2u:5165: tatra cotprekṣā dhvanyate---aṅganābhirākarṇapūrṇaurnetraśarairhatār ikṣaṇaśrīḥ sarvasvabhūtā yasya yato 'to na tasthau /
GK16andhvc2u:5170: kimākārāḥ prasiddhīḥ ramyā ityevamākārāḥ viviktā janasaṅkulatvābhāvādityato heto rāgaṃ sambhogābhilāṣaṃ vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5173: yato hetoḥ viviktā vibhaktaṅgyo laṭabhāḥ yāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5179: 'na tasthāvi'tyatra vāstavo hetustrāsākula ityanena darśita ityāha---trāsetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5180: ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ karṇaparyantavyāptaiḥ ākarṇakṛṣṭaiśca netraśaraiḥ netrāṇyeva śarāstaiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:5192: tathācoktasthale ivādiśabdābhāve 'pyutprekṣārūpārthasya sahṛdayānāṃ pratīterasambaddhatvāpādānaṃ na yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5203: api tvarthasaundaryabalādeveti sarvathā dhvanyamāna eva śleṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5204: ata eva vadhva iva valabhya ityabhidadhatāpi vṛttikṛtopamādhvaniriti noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:5206: samā iti hi yadi spaṣṭaṃ bhavettadopamāyā eva spaṣṭatvācchleṣastadākṣiptaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:5208: na ca tena vinābhidāyā aparipuṣṭatā kācit /
GK16andhvc2u:5209: ata eva samāptāyāmevābhidhāyāṃ sahṛdayaireva sa dvitīyo 'rtho 'pṛthakprayatnenaivāvagamyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5212: 'pīnaścaitro divā nāti' ityatrābhidhaivāparyavasiteti saiva svārthanirvāhāyārthāntaraṃ śabdāntaraṃ vākarṣatītyanumānasya śrutārthāpattervā bālapriyā samamiti śabdādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5229: yūnāṃ savadhūkānāṃ satāṃ valabhīsevanasyārthasya prakṛtatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5238: divābhojanamakurvataḥ kutaḥ pīnatvamityākāṅkṣāsattvena śāntākāṅkṣasya bodhasyājananāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5251: madanaviśeṣaṇībhūto yo 'ṅkuritādiśabdaḥ sañjāteṣatprādurbhāvādiḥ tadarthaḥ taṭgataṃ tadāśritam /
GK16andhvc2u:5265: yathāsaṅkhyadhvaniryathā--- aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca sahakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5266: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca hṛdi madanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5268: evamanye 'pyalaṅkārā yathoyogaṃ locanam tārkikamīmāṃsakayorna dhvaniprasaṅga ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc2u:5272: yathā ca dīpakadhvaniḥ-- mā bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madavalaḥ paraśurvā /
GK16andhvc2u:5273: vajramindrakaraviprasṛtaṃ vā svasti te 'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa //
GK16andhvc2u:5278: priyatamena sākamudyāne viharantī kācinnāyikā bhramaramevamāheti bhṛṅgasyābhidhāyāṃ bālapriyā 'aṅkurite' iti saptamyantapāṭho 'pi pūrvārdhe dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5289: atra “yaśca nimbaṃ paraśune“tyādāviva mā bhavantamanala ityatra dhākṣīdityasya,
GK16andhvc2u:5308: pratyutāmāntraṇaṃ tasyā maugdhyavijṛmbhitamiti abhidhayā tāvannāprastutapraśaṃsā samāpyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5326: bhṛṅgavṛttāntasya yadyaprastutatvaṃ bhavetadā priyatamopālambharūpārtha eva vākyasya viśrāntyā tasyābhidhayā samāpyatvaṃ bhavet,
GK16andhvc2u:5350: yaḥ gaurāṅgīkucakumbha iva bhūriḥ subhagaścābhogo yasya tasmin /
GK16andhvc2u:5351: sudhādhāmani candre kālāgaruṇā yā patrabhaṅgaracanā racitaḥ patrabhaṅga iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:5353: yadvā---racanāyā āvāsaḥ āspadatvaṃ tena ekena sārāyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5358: api tu gaurāṅgīstanābhogasthānīye candramasi kālāgurupatrrabhaṅgavicchittyāspadatvena yaḥ sāratāmutkṛṣṭatāmācaratīti tanna jānīmaḥ kimetadvastviti sasandeho 'pi dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5362: cāṭukaṃ kurvāṇaścandravartinī ceyaṃ kuvalayadalaśyāmalakāntirevameva karotīti prativastūpamādhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5363: sudhādhāmanīti candraparyāyatayopāttamapi padaṃ santāpaṃ vininīṣurityatra hetutāmapi bālapriyā eṣa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5366: tena dīpitāni yāni utkānāmutkaṇṭhitānāṃ vanitānāṃ cetāṃsi tadadhivāsena udbhavo yasya tam /
GK16andhvc2u:5390: sāraḥ utkṛṣṭa ivācarati sāro bhavati iti vā vigrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5415: śobhābhiḥ saha uddīpayati iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5417: tvadīyakucaśobhā mṛgāṅkaśobhā ca saha madanamuddīpayata iti sahoktidhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5421: yataḥ--- helāpi kasyacidacintyaphalaprasūtyai kasyāpi nālamaṇave 'pi phalāya yatnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5422: digdantiromacalanaṃ dharaṇīṃ dhunoti khātsampatannapi latāṃ calayenna bhṛṅgaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5423: eṣāṃ tu bhedānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭitva saṅkaratvaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ cintyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5424: atiśayoktidhvaniryathā mamaiva--- kelīkandalitasya vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapuste dṛśau bhaṅgībhaṅgarakāmakārbhukamidaṃ bhrūnarmakarmakramaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5425: āpāte 'pi vikārakāraṇamaho vaktrāmbujanmāsavaḥ satyaṃ sundari vedhasastrijagatīsārastvamekākṛtiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5426: atra hi madhu māsamadanāsavānāṃ trailokye subhagatānyonyaṃ paripoṣakatvena /
GK16andhvc2u:5437: he sundari / te tava dṛśau kelīvilāsijanasya krīḍā tasyāḥ kandalaṃ navāṅkuraḥ riṣadāvirbhāva iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5440: vibhramaḥ strīṇāṃ śṛhgāraceṣṭā tatkārī vibhramaḥ śobhā,
GK16andhvc2u:5441: tacchālī vā yo madhurvasantaḥ tasya dhuraṃ kāmoddīpanādibhāraṃ vahatīti dhuryam /
GK16andhvc2u:5443: tvadīyaṃ netradvitayamacirāvirbhūtasya vasantasya kāmoddīpanādikāryakāri śarīraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5448: yadvā---bhaṅgīyuktaṃ vakraṃ ca yat kāmasya kārbhukaṃ kramikakarmaviśiṣṭaṃ dhanuḥ tadbhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5451: tathā te vaktrāmbujanmani mukhapajhe ya āsavaḥ madyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5456: ataḥ tvamekā vedhasaḥ kṛtiḥ sṛṣṭiḥ trijagatīsāraḥ trailokyasārabhūtā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5464: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // DhvK_2.28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5466: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // 28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5467: dhvanyaṅgatā cobhābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ vyañjakatvena vyaṅgyatvena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:5469: vyaṅgyatve 'pyalaṅkārāṇāṃ pradhānyavivakṣāyāmeva locanam tvayi lokottareṇa vapuṣā sambhūya sthitā ityatiśayoktirdhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5470: āpāte 'pi vikārakāraṇamityāsvādaparamparākriyayāpi vinā vikārātmanaḥ phalasya sampattiriti vibhāvanādhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5476: nanuktāstāvaccirantanairalaṅkārāsteṣāṃ tu bhavatā yadi vyaṅgyatvaṃ pradarśitaṃ kimiyatetyāśaṅkyāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5477: yeṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ vācyatvena śarīrīkaraṇaṃ śarīrabhūtātprastutādarthāntarabhūtatayā aśarīrāṇāṃ kaṭakādisthānīyānāṃ śarīratāpādanaṃ vyavasthitaṃ bālapriyā te madhumadanāsavāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5480: madanadhanuṣo bhrūrūpeṇa sthityā madanasya sthitiḥ sidhyatīti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5487: dṛgdvayasya madhośca sāmyavivakṣayā dṛśau vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapurityuktyā “nyūnasyāpi viśiṣṭene“tyādinā bhāmahādilakṣitā tulyayogitetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5493: niyataḥ niyamitaḥ viṣayaḥ alaṅkāraviśeṣarūpāśrayo yasya tatkṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5515: locanam yadi vā vācyatve sati yeṣāṃ śarīratāpādanamapi na vyavasthitaṃ durghaṭamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5516: te 'laṅkārā dhvanervyāpārasya kāvyasya vāṅgatāṃ vyaṅgyarūpatayā gatāḥ santaḥ parāṃ durlabhāṃ chāyāṃ kāntimātmarūpatāṃ yānti /
GK16andhvc2u:5520: evambhūtā ceyaṃ vyaṅgyatā yā apradhānabhūtāpi vācyamātrālaṅkārebhya utkarṣamalaṅkārāṇāṃ vitarati /
GK16andhvc2u:5576: tadaprādhānye tu vācyālaṅkāra eva pradhānamiti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyateti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5577: nanvalaṅkāro vastunā vyajyate alaṅkārāntareṇa ca vyajyata ityatrodāharaṇāni kimiti na darśitānītyāśaṅkyāha---vastviti /
GK16andhvc2u:5603: vā prakāśane cārutvotkarṣanibandhane sati prādhānye 'rthaśaktudbhavānuraṇarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniravagantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5604: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādya tadābhāsavivekaṃ kartumucyate--
GK16andhvc2u:5606: vācyasyāṅgatayā vāpi nāsyāsau gocaro dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.31 //
GK16andhvc2u:5610: tatra ya eva sphuṭaḥ śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā vā prakāśate sa eva dhvanermārgo netaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5613: kamalāarā ṇaṃ maliā haṃsā uḍḍāviā ṇa a piucchā /
GK16andhvc2u:5614: locanam vyañjakasya ca pratyekaṃ vastvalaṅkārarūpatayā dviprakāratvāccaturvidho 'yamathaśaktyudbhava iti tātparyam //29// ,30 //
GK16andhvc2u:5622: te ca pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoruktabhedanayena caturdheti dvādaśavidho 'rthaśaktimūlaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5624: te ca padavākyaprakāśatvena pratyekaṃ dvividhā vakṣyante /
GK16andhvc2u:5627: bālapriyā subodhāyoktān vakṣyamāṇāṃśca dhvaniprabhedān saṅkalayyāha---avivakṣitavācyaityādinā pañjatriṃśadbhedā ityantena /
GK16andhvc2u:5635: atra padavākyaprakāśatvena bhedasyoktatvādanena varṇasaṅghaṭanāprabandhaprakāśayatvena yadbhedatrayaṃ tadeva vivakṣitaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:5642: keṇa vi gāmataḍāe abbhaṃ uttāṇaaṃ phaliham //
GK16andhvc2u:5643: atra hi pratiyamānasya mugdhavadhvā jaladharapratibimbadarśanasya vācyāṅgatvameva /
GK16andhvc2u:5644: evaṃvidhe viṣaye 'nyatrāpi yatra vyaṅgyāpekṣayā vācyasya cārutvotkarṣapratītyā prādhānyamavasīyate,
GK16andhvc2u:5650: evaṃvidho hi viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyodāharaṇatvena nirdakṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5651: locanam asyetyātmabhūtasya dhvanerasau kāvyaviśeṣo na gocaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5652: kamalākarā na malitā haṃsā uḍḍāyitā na ca sahasā /
GK16andhvc2u:5656: anye tu pi ucchā pitṛṣvasaḥ itthamāmantryate /
GK16andhvc2u:5659: vācyenaiva hi vismayavibhāvarūpeṇa mugdhimātiśayaḥ pratīyata iti vācyādeva cārutvasampat /
GK16andhvc2u:5670: kasyāścinmugdhāyāstaṭāke pratibimbitamabhraṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāyāḥ sakhījanaṃ pitṛṣvasāraṃ vā prati kamaletyādivacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:5671: kenāpi grāmataṭāke abhraṃ medhamaṇḍalam uttānitamuttānaṃ kṛtaṃ sat anyathā yathopari tathā jalāntardarśanaṃ na bhavet kṣiptaṃ parantu /
GK16andhvc2u:5672: kamalākarāḥ na malināḥ sañjātamalāḥ malinā iti vā chāyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5675: sahasetyasya sthāne pitṛṣvasa iti chāyāṃ kecit paṭhantītyāha---anya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5685: yatra tu prakaraṇādipratipattyā nirdhārataviśeṣo vācyo 'rthaḥ punaḥ pratīyamānāṅgatvenaivāvabhāsate so 'syaivānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya dhvanermārgaḥ
GK16andhvc2u:5687: ucciṇasu paḍia kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ haliasuhṇe /
GK16andhvc2u:5688: aha de visamavirāvo samureṇa suo valaasaddo //
GK16andhvc2u:5692: aṅgānītyekamapi na tādṛgaṅgaṃ yadgāmbhīryāvahitthavaśena saṃvarītuṃ pāritam,
GK16andhvc2u:5693: sadintītyāstāṃ gṛhakarmasampādanaṃ svātmānamapi dhartuṃ na prabhavantīti /
GK16andhvc2u:5698: punarvācyaḥ punarapi svaśabdenokto 'ta eva svātmāvagateḥ sampannapūrvatvādena tāvanmātraparyavasāyī na bhavati bālapriyā datteti /
GK16andhvc2u:5699: dattasaṅketo yaścauryakāmuko jāraḥ tasya ratasamucitasthāne vetasalatāgahane prāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5710: gṛhakarmayoge sphuṭaṃ tathā na lakṣyamāṇānīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5724: vākyajanyabodhaṃ pratyeva prakaraṇādijñānasya hetutvāt upalakṣaṇaṃ cedamanumānādajanyaniścayasya /
GK16andhvc2u:5725: 'uccinvi'tyādau śephālikādhūnanaṃ na kartavyaṃ śvaśurakopādyaniṣṭajanakatvāditi vacanādijanyo bodhayitavyanāyikādigato niścayo grāhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5728: ata atra hyavinayapatinā saha ramamāṇā sakhī bahiḥśrutavalayakalakalayā locanam tathāvidhaśca
GK16andhvc2u:5730: sphuṭaṃ vadatā vyaṅgyaguṇībhāve tvetadviparītameva nibandhanaṃ mantavyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5731: uccinu patitaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śephālikāṃ hālakasnuṣe /
GK16andhvc2u:5732: eṣa te viṣamavipākaḥ śvaśureṇa śruto valayaśabdaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5734: yataḥ śvaśuraḥ śophālikālatikāṃ prayatnai rakṣaṃstasyā ākarṣaṇadhūnanādinā kupyati /
GK16andhvc2u:5737: atra ca 'kassa vā ṇa hoi roso' ityetadanusāreṇa vyākhyā kartavyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5740: svatassiddhatayā avacanīya eva so 'rthaḥ syāditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5741: nanvevaṃ vyaṅgyasyopaskāratā pratyutoktā bālapriyā evetyasya vivaraṇam---svāmetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5755: śvaśureṇa śrutaḥ san viṣamavipākaḥ viṣamo 'niṣṭajanako vipākaḥ pariṇāmo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5760: atra yatkiñcidvyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatve 'pi vyaṅgyāntaramādāya dhvanitvamiti darśayati vṛttau--'atre'tyādinā /
GK16andhvc2u:5774: sahṛdayānāṃ tu ramamāṇanāyikāyai sakhī pratibodhayatīti ca jñānaṃ jñāyamānaṃ tadyvaṅgyaṃ vā vācyārthalābhaṃ prati sahakārīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5785: punarvācya iti grantho yathāvyākhyātastathā sakhyā pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5788: evaṃ vivakṣitavācyasya dhvanestadābhāsaviveke prastute satyavivakṣitavācyasyāpi taṃ kartumāha---
GK16andhvc2u:5789: avyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ skhalad-gateḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5790: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhir viṣayo dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5792: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhirviṣayo dhvaneḥ // 32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5805: yathā---- preṅkhatpremaprabandhapracuraparicaye prauḍhasīmantinīnāṃ cittākāśāvakāśe viharati satataṃ yaḥ sa saubhāgyabhūmiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5807: cittākāśa iti gauṇaḥ prayogaḥ kavinā kṛto 'pi na dhvanyamānarūpasundaraprayojanāṃśaparyavasāyī /
GK16andhvc2u:5820: prastute ityasya ārabdhe prakṛte iti vā vyākhyāne sati tatpadamasaṅgataṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5826: premṇaḥ prabandhaḥ prakarṣeṇa bandhaḥ sthirīkaraṇaṃ tena saha pracuraḥ paricayo yasya tasmin /
GK16andhvc2u:5832: skhaladgaterupacaritasya śabdasyāvyutpatteraśaktervā nibandho yaḥ sa ca na dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5835: yad vyaṅgyasyāṅgi-bhūtasya tat pūrṇaṃ dhvani-lakṣaṇam // DhvK_2.33 //
GK16andhvc2u:5838: locanam yathā---- viṣamakāṇḍakuṭumbakasañcayapravara vārinidhau patatā tvayā /
GK16andhvc2u:5846: prathamoddyote yaḥ prasiddhyanurodhapravartitavyavahārāḥ kavaya ityatra 'vadati bisinīpatrraśayanam' ityādi bhākta uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5847: sa na kevalaṃ dhvanerna viṣayo yāvadayamanyo 'pīti caśabdasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5848: uktameva dhvanisvarūpaṃ tadābhāsavivekahetutayā kārikākāro 'nuvadatītyabhiprāyeṇa vṛttikṛdupaskāraṃ dadāti--yata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5856: viṣamaḥ viṣamasaṃkhyākaḥ kāṇḍaśśaro yasya tasya kāmadevasya,
GK16andhvc2u:5857: yaḥ kuḍumbakasañjayaḥ tasya pravaramukhya he candretyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5859: kuraṅgeti pāṭhe ca latākuraṅgeṇa mṛgeṇa vidhūrṇitaṃ bhājanaṃ madhyabhāgo yasya tasminnityātmaviśeṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:5867: sa ceti cakāraḥ prathamodyotoktasamuccāyaka ityāha--prathamadyoto ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5873: avabhāsanapadena avabhāsamānaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5885: vṛttāvevakāreṇa tato 'nyasya cābhāsarūpatvameveti sūcayatā tadābhāsavivekahetubhāvoyaḥ prakrantaḥ sa eva nirvāhita iti śivam //
GK16andhvc2u:5888: iti śrīmahāmāheśvarācāryavaryābhinavaguptonmīlite sahṛdayāloka locane dhvanisaṅkete dvitīya uddyotaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5895: yayā māyārūpayā parameśvaryā prājyaṃ prabhūtam idaṃ jagadati prathamāntatayā /
GK16andhvc2u:5897: prollāsaḥ pratītistanmātram sat na tu vastusaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5901: idaṃ jagatpaśyantīṃ tāmabhinavagupto 'haṃ vande iti sambandhaḥ /
